data.name: Paris Segway Night Tour
data.description: Enjoy your private night tour with your family or your friends. Enjoy the city of lights from up close with a local guide and cover major monuments hassle free on our Segways. Ask your guide for some tips to enjoy Paris after this tour to make it even more exciting!

data.name: Eiffel Tower: Skip-the-Line Small-Group Tour to Summit
data.description: Your visit to Paris wouldn’t be complete without a climb to the top of the world-famous icon of France, the Eiffel Tower. Why not ensure that your experience is as smooth and easy as possible? Discover the fascinating stories behind the construction of the ‘Iron Lady’, and gaze upon the Paris skyline as your guide discusses the many famous monuments on display as you continue your ascension to the top of the tower and behold the City of Lights extending at your feet with the Skip-the-line tour.

data.name: 3 Hour Electric Bike Tour in Paris
data.description:
See more of Paris in this electric bike tour. From the legendary monuments to hidden backstreets, the charms of Paris are waiting to be discovered: all in 4 hours. Let the comfort and ease of an electric bike allow you to experience more of the world’s most famous city.

Inside the Marais: Enjoy a game of Pétanque at the oldest Parisian monument. Student life in the Latin Quarter: Sit back at the "Luco” then wander the typically Parisian side-streets of Butte aux Cailles. The always-busy artists’ cafés of Saint-Germain-des-Prés are where the action is. But if you need a break, the Nouvelles Berges de Seine offer you the peace and quiet of the riverbank. If the Champs-Élysées caught you looking then Place Vendôme and its variety of fine jewelry stores are where you should be…and it’s right next door to the Palais Royal and the Louvre.

The allure of the most beautiful city in the world are there for the taking. All in one tour—everything is possible.

data.name: BMX courses in Boulogne Billancourt
data.shortDescription: Discover BMX freestyle in Boulogne Billancourt with No Limit Coaching and their qualified instructors.
data.description:
Discover BMX freestyle in Boulogne Billancourt in the south west of Paris with No Limit Coaching.

No Limit Coaching offers BMX freestyle lessons for beginners and advanced riders. Manu your teacher is a champion in the discipline.

You will follow a private or group lesson of 2 hours during which you will benefit from Manu's advice to progress and reach your goal.

During your session you will learn to trust yourself and to surpass yourself, to manage the risks so that you can leave your comfort zone. Depending on your level you will learn various tricks such as jumping, wheel lifting, hands off, backwards, etc.

Get ready for the Paris 2024 Olympic Games with No Limit Coaching!

data.name: Skateboarding lesson in Neuilly Plaisance
data.shortDescription: Whether you wish to start skateboarding, learn special tricks or participate to a father and son or a mother and daughter session, these private lessons are made for you!
data.description:
Thanks to this skateboarding course offered by Paris Skate Culture in Neuilly Plaisance in the 93, you will learn skateboarding in the best possible conditions with qualified and passionate instructors!

Whether you want to start skateboarding, learn to master a trick or just have a father/son or mother/daughter session, PSC's private lessons are for you!

Supervised by passionate and experienced state-licensed instructors, the lessons take place in the new covered skatepark of the city of Neuilly Plaisance on the banks of the Marne.

The covered skatepark is 496 square meters and is located near the RER A train station. It is composed of many modules including a quarter of 1 meter 70, a double table, a medium ramp, an inclined plane, several rails and a marble block that recalls the historical spot of Bercy.

Come and skate in Neuilly Plaisance in the east of Paris, the ideal place to learn while having fun and to progress!

data.name: Vedettes de Paris Seine River Cruise Direct Access E-Ticket
data.description:
Embark on one of our cruise boats and discover all the secrets of Paris thanks to the expert knowledge of our guide by passing by the most emblematic monuments of Paris: the Eiffel Tower, Notre-Dame Cathedral, Orsay Museum, Louvre Museum, Grand Palais ... This cruise has been created in order to surprise you between breathtaking views of the monuments on the docks of the Seine river and unique comments. Parisians or visitors, adults or children, wonderement assured.
The best way to visit Paris, guaranteed without blister on your feet!

Drinks and snacks options available:
- Time for a Treat : a crêpe or a cookie + a soft drink, to get at the bar on board
- Parisian Pic-Nic : a sandwich + a cookie + a soft drink, to get at the Café des Vedettes kiosk
- Gourmet Box : foie gras on bread + a glass of Sauternes wine, to get at the Café des Vedettes kiosk

data.name: Paris Private Day Tour & Seine Cruise for Kids and Families
data.description: This tour is an ideal introduction to Paris for first-time family visitors. It has been carefully designed to optimize your time and provide a playful experience for your kids. Breakfast in a typical café, some nice strolls to sightsee Parisian highlights, a few metro rides (to feel like a genuine Parisian), a 1-hour Seine cruise to admire the monuments along the river, and a glimpse at the Eiffel Tower from a great spot… What a treat!

data.name: Private Louvre Teens Tour with skip-the-line Tickets
data.description:
With our Louvre Adventure Game, your teens will be craving a visit the Louvre! During this 2.5-hour exciting chase inside the largest museum in the world, they will be engaged in a series of enigmas and quests to discover some of the most famous masterpieces. From ancient Egypt to the Mona Lisa and Mesopotamia (and much more!), they will live a unique experience.

IMPORTANT NOTE: this tour doesn't include access to the Leonardo Da Vinci exhibition occurring at the Louvre between October 24th 2019 and February 24th 2020

data.name: Champagne Tasting for Two in Paris
data.description: Welcome to Paris' most acclaimed wine bar! In a beautiful setting, you and your special person will be served two glasses of unique Champagne. A friendly and bilingual sommelier will tell you about the specificity of what you will be tasting. This special date is perfect for leisurely afternoon drinking as well as for a unique pre-dinner aperitif of discovery and fun.

data.name: 2-Hour Private Paris Champs-Élysées Walking Tour
data.description: Explore the most important street of Paris - Champs-Élysées and its magnificent sites on a private guided walk. Admire its opulence, its epic width and exuberant façades; also, learn about the surprising story behind its creation and its great historical and political importance.

data.name: Eiffel Tower & Père Lachaise Cemetery Guided Tours with Seine River Cruise
data.description:
Get close to the sky and admire Paris from the second floor of the Eiffel Tower

Unwind while contemplating many monuments such as the Louvre Museum and Notre Dame Cathedral on a Seine River cruise

Discover the tombs of Frédéric Chopin, Jim Morrison, Edith Piaf, Oscar Wilde and other celebrities in the most famous cemetery of France

data.name: Paris at Christmas : Festive Shopping Past & Present
data.description: Join a local Parisian guide and discover the delights of Christmas in Paris. Explore the charming covered passages, full of tiny boutiques and cafés, where chic Parisians have been shopping since the early 19th century. See the famous displays at the ‘Grands Magasins’, where children come every year to marvel at the fantastical windows, and discover the delights of French gastronomy at this most gourmet time of year!

data.name: Paris City Tour and Eiffel Tower Half-Day Trip with Admission
data.description:
Paris Eiffel Tower, a timeless and extraordinary romantic stopover...
Be one of the lucky ones to climb up to the second level of the Eiffel Tower with priority access while wondering at this architectural marvel. Originally constructed as a temporary exhibit for the 1889 World Fair by Gustave Eiffel, the Iron Lady represents nowadays the icon of the City of Light.
Your guide will enlighten you on the fascinating history and architecture of the Tower and introduce you the most famous Parisian monuments along the skyline such as the Notre-Dame Cathedral, the Arc de Triomphe, Les Invalides... Our small group tour ensure you get the most from your guide.
In addition, you will have unlimited time to walk around and enjoy the spectacular panoramic view over the city, from the Sacré-Coeur to the Montparnasse Tower.
Extend the experience choosing the Cruise option and embark on board of our sight seeing boat for a City Tour and enjoy the most of Paris in one day.

data.name: Louvre Museum Semi-Private Skip the Line Guided Tour
data.description: Take a 3 hour small group tour of the Louvre and let your expert guide lead you to the most important and iconic artworks in the world’s largest museum. See the Mona Lisa, the Venus de Milo, the Winged Victory of Samothrace and much more. Groups of 6 people or fewer allow for an intimate and relaxed visit, ensuring you don’t miss any of the dazzling treasures housed in this incredible museum.

data.name: Père Lachaise Cemetery Walking Tour in Paris
data.description: Join us for a picturesque walk where you will learn the fascinating history for the Père Lachaise Cemetery. See the tombs of famous historical characters like Oscar Wilde, Jim Morrison, Chopin, Edith Piaf and more.

data.name: Paris at Christmas with The Champs Elysées & the Arc de Triomphe
data.description: Experience Christmas the Parisian way! See the sparkling lights on the Champs Elysées - one of the most recognizable avenues in the world - stroll past the dazzling storefronts, savor delicious French macaroons from Ladurée and end your tour on the top of the Arc de Triomphe, for some of the best views over the glittering City of Lights.

data.name: Centre Pompidou Must-Sees of Modern Art Guided Tour
data.description: Art in Paris does not stop at the Mona Lisa! Take your explorations further and experience art in a different way at the MOMA at the Pompidou Center, with its stunning collection of modern and contemporary art. Daring architecture, astonishing artworks and spectacular views over Paris, a visit to this iconic museum with an expert guide is a must for art lovers, architecture fans and the curious in all of us.

data.name: Private or Small Group Paris: 3 Hour Morning Cheese, Art, and Local Life Tour
data.description: Cheese? Check. Macarons? Check. Art? Check. Join a local guide on this private Paris tour to experience the mindblowing gastronomic feats, instantly recognisable architectural icons, and secret spots that make Paris so endearing.

data.name: Paris French Wine Tasting 3-Course Dinner with Sommelier
data.description:
Enjoy four top-notch French wines and dinner at an acclaimed Paris wine bar on this 2.5-hour experience. Settle in the bar’s cellar-like tasting room with your fellow wine-loving guests, and with an experienced sommelier at the helm, enjoy generous tastings of four fabulous wines, including Champagne — each chosen to complement your three courses. Learn the origins of each wine, and get insider tips on tasting wines, pairing different varieties with food, and more. Soak up the convivial atmosphere, and enjoy a digestif such as Calvados to finish your experience.

THIS TOUR IS ONLY AVAILABLE IN ENGLISH.

data.name: Paris Private Bistrot Crawl: Wine, Beer and Aperitif
data.description: Learn about Paris through its bars and taverns – sample local wines and beers as you discover the history of Paris. Explore the lesser-known but übercool areas of Bastille and Aligre. Experience the buzz of a French bistrot and wine bars. Visit one of Paris’ oldest markets. Taste delicious French specialties along the way.

data.name: Tootbus Paris Discovery: Hop-On Hop-Off Bus Tour
data.description:
Check out all the wonderful things Paris has to offer in a day or two when you hop on board the Tootbus Paris Discovery tour! From the comfort and convenience of our 100% clean buses, Paris Discovery will take you past Opera, Louvre Museum, Notre-Dame Cathedral, Sainte-Chapelle, Orsay Museum, Concorde, Champs-Elysées, Arc de Triomphe, Eiffel Tower, Les Invalides, Grand Palais and many more. Get a first overview of the city, make your way around, pick the sights you want to explore in more detail and hop-off at the closest location to visit the landmarks and attractions. Choose to to see the top art masterpieces and paintings at the Louvre Museum, stop at Notre Dame and take a moment to admire its architecture from the left bank of the Seine, shop in the Champs-Elysées or climb the top of the Arc de Triomphe or the Eiffel Tower for the best views of the city!

Upon first validation, your ticket is valid 24 or 48 hours; according to the option booked.

data.name: Learn French and Sip wine
data.description: Learn and Practice French with a wine tasting! Combine French language and a wine tasting on this walking tour, I wil take you through the small streets of the Saint Michel area, where will we get acquainted in French, learn some directions and practice numbers and key conversation sentences to order at a café, buy a metro ticket, all that strolling the beautiful Notre-Dame Cathedral, Hôtel de ville and finally Le Marais where your wine tasting will take place. You will learn the gestures, regions of France and we will practice practical vocabulary while you are sipping on wine and eating cheese.

data.name: Normandy D-Day Landing Beaches Guided Tour from Paris
data.description: Tailor program to discover, in one day, landing beaches and sites of legend : Pointe du Hoc, Omaha Beach, Colleville American Cemetery, Arromanches with a professional guide. Departure from the center of Paris.

data.name: Seine River Paris by Night Sightseeing Sparkling Cruise with Champagne
data.description: Discover Paris in a festive mood, where you can hop on board and let yourself be amazed by the main monuments in Paris situated along the Seine River while sipping a cup of champagne. Share with your partner a champagne tasting experience on board this 70 minute sightseeing cruise with commentary on a double decker boat. This experience for two is entertaining, romantic, and an absolutely "sparkling" experience! Please note that there are many start times throughout the day, and this will be a shared experience with as many as 1000 people per boat.

data.name: Paris City Tour by Minivan and Montmartre
data.description: Take this small group morning or afternoon tour to combine an overview of Paris' famous monuments, squares and buildings with some leisure time in Paris' most bohemian quarter, Montmartre. You'll be picked up and dropped off at our centrally located agency in Paris by air-conditioned minivan, which holds a maximum of only eight passengers and ensures you'll receive individual attention from your expert tour guide.

data.name: Tootbus Paris by Night Tour
data.description: Immerse yourself the magic and romance of Paris light up for the night onboard Tootbus. Experience the city as the sun begins to set and watch the city burst into life at night, we have booked the best seats for you to admire the lights show! From the open top deck of our 100% green bus, you will enjoy a relax and pleasant ride through Paris's iconic attractions at their glittering best including; Opera, Place Vendôme, Place de la Concorde, Champs Elysées, Arc de Triomphe Eiffel Tower, Invalides, Louvre Museum and many more.

data.name: The Medieval Heart of Paris - History Walk (Small Group Tour)
data.description:
The two islands sitting in the center of Paris are amongst the best preserved areas of the city and represent its historic heart.  

Medieval palaces, Gothic cathedrals and of course Notre Dame, the city's oldest monument. 

Walk with me through the historic heart of the city & discover vestiges of Paris from the Middle Ages, the hidden treasures of these two beautiful neighbourhoods.  A trained historian, I provide commentary & explanations that will provide the historic & architectural context of the buildings we will visit.  More than a stroll through Paris, this is a lesson in the history of the city's foundation !

data.name: Bateaux Parisiens Seine River Sightseeing Cruise
data.description: Cruise through the heart of Paris on this 1-hour Bateaux Parisiens tour by luxury sightseeing boat. While gliding along the UNESCO World Heritage-listed banks of the River Seine, you’ll see legendary Paris attractions such as Notre Dame Cathedral and pass beneath elegant bridges like Pont Neuf. Listen to audio commentary and learn all about the sights and history of the city on this must-do Paris cruise!

data.name: THE Ultimate Wine and Cheese Tasting (10 cheeses, 10 wines)
data.description:
Ready for an expandable tasting of great wines and cheeses in Paris?
Taste 10 wines paired with 10 cheeses in a former Royal cellar : a unique experience in Paris.
The Ultimate Wine and Cheese tasting is THE MUST DO experience for wine and cheese lovers. It takes place right by the Louvre, in stunning 18th century wine cellars that were once used by the King of France himself.

data.name: Lido de Paris "Paris Merveilles" Late Night Show Admission
data.description:
Enjoy an evening of glitzy, glamorous cabaret at Paris’ brand new Lido de Paris "Paris Merveilles" show. Head to the city’s famous Avenue des Champs-Elysées and discover a world of decadent dancers, sparkling sequins, extraordinary sets, magical lighting and captivating music. With the delectable Bluebell girls on stage, take in the sights and sounds of one of Paris’ newest and most impressive cabaret performances. Dreamlike and tantalizing, the show's sets offer a tour de force of imagination and excitement!

Lido de Paris is free for children under 11*
*Not applicable for special nights like Christmas and New Year's Eve.

data.name: Paris Brunch Experience by Luxury Bus
data.description: On this unique panoramic 105-minute bus tour, enjoy a gourmand brunch in true Parisian style while admiring top Paris attractions including the Eiffel Tower, the Louvre Museum, the Opera Garnier and the Champs-Elysées, etc. Board a glass-enclosed, double-decker bus, take a seat at your table and take in beautiful views of Paris from every angle as you enjoy a sweet break with a cold and a hot beverage. Ask your waiter for an audio guide if you’d like to hear a little history of the famous sights you pass.

data.name: Paris Gourmet Food Tour
data.description: Come take a delicious walk with former New York chef and caterer Richard Nahem and discover the bustling food and gourmet shops of Paris overflowing with the freshest fruits and vegetables, local seafood, meats, prepared dishes, and much more. Food shop visits include an award-winning cheese shop with over 50 varieties, a top foie gras boutique, and a sensational middle-eastern gourmet shop with unusual glazed and dried fruits, barrels of pickles and olives, and a vast selection of exotic spices from around the world. The tour will also include tastings of artisianal chocolates, a heavenly meringue and whipped cream confection, and a bakery which won a prize for their baguettes.

data.name: Explore the collection at the Pompidou
data.description: Venture through the Centre Pompidou with an art expert, excited to share their passion for numerous important works housed in this important museum. On this private group tour, you will explore Europe’s largest collection of 20th-century art, including works by Henri Matisse, Pablo Picasso, Max Ernst, Salvador Dali, Man Ray, Wassily Kandinsky, and Marcel Duchamp. Discover new works of the 21st century in the contemporary collections continuing the long French tradition of representing living artist within its’ institutions. See works by Yves Klein, Gerhard Richter, Mike Kelley, Andy Warhol, Annette Messager, Robert Rauschenberg, and Francis Bacon. On the 5th floor, you will get an in-depth understanding of the movements that compose modernism. On the 4th floor venture though the contemporary art collection and the Pompidou’s interpretation of which artists are relevant today.

data.name: PSG Experience - Stadium Tour Parc des Princes
data.description:
Paris Saint-Germain reinvents the stadium visit by offering you this fun, immersive and unique tour. Discover emblematic, secret places and share your emotions throughout the visit.

A self-guided tour behind the scenes of the stadium: from the top of the stands to the subs' bench, from the VIP boxes to the conference room, from the mixed zone to the players' dressing...with the trophy room as the highlight! A fun, accessible, multilingual tour which is open to everyone and which will will thrill fans, enchant tourists and amaze young and old alike.

Free visit for children under 5.

data.name: Skip the Line: Musée de la Magie Admission Ticket
data.description:
Welcome to the Museum of Magic!

Located in the heart of historic Paris, the Museum of Magic offers a complete panorama of the wonderful world of illusionists from the 18th century to the present day.

Magicians comment and guide your visit which ends with a magic session. A real permanent show!

Follow the guide!

data.name: Paris to Loire Valley Castles 2-Day Tour with Admission Fees
data.description: Discover some of the most picturesque villages on this 2-day Loire Valley Castles tour from Paris. Leave the city behind you and travel into rural France with your guide. Visit famous French castles such as Château de Chenonceau, Château de Cheverny and Château de Chambord. Explore the Château du Clos Lucé, Leonado da Vinci’s final place of residence in the 16th-century. Admire the castles spectacular architecture and ornate interiors, and learn of their fascinating histories from your guide.

data.name: Paris Sightseeing Big Bus Night Tour
data.description:
Pick from one of our Big Bus Night tours to see the beauty of Paris after dark on a 2-hour Big Bus city night tour. This open-top bus loop showcases Paris' legendary landmarks and monuments illuminated at night. See the sparkling lights of the Eiffel Tower, the Champs-Elysées, the Moulin Rouge, Pigalle, and much more.
Upgrade your ticket for the Twilight Gourmet tour that includesTour includes a ¼ bottle of fine champagne, and a gourmet pastry designed by renowned pastry chef Jeffrey Cagnes and presented by Douceurs Nomades.

data.name: Private Paris Photoshoot with a Professional Photographer
data.description: By having a professional photographer at the helm, this 3-hour private tour takes you on a visual adventure through the must-see parts of Paris while at the same time expertly capturing your group in a series of top quality photos. We propose the following photo-op optimized itinerary, which we’ve carefully designed to include the most photogenic sights in Paris. However, we’re happy to tailor the itinerary to your personal interests. Your photo-shoot starts at the Palais Royal where you’ll soak up the beauty of the gardens and discover the rich history of this former royal residence. You’ll also get a chance to frolic among the famous Buren Columns, where many a high profile fashion photo-shoot has taken place.

data.name: Versailles Palace and Gardens Private Tour for Families
data.description: Explore what life was like at the Palace of Versailles living amongst the nobility and the Kings and Queens of France. On a private tour lead by a specialist in historical family tours, you’ll experience the splendor of Versailles from its intricate painted ceilings and golden doorways to the magnificent Hall of Mirrors overlooking the majestic palace gardens.  As you explore the secret details of the Palace and gardens with our exclusive skip the line access, your guide will bring to life Versailles as it was in the time of Kings and Queens. Activity sheets for children are included as the perfect souvenir of their visit!

data.name: Giverny & Versailles Palace Audio Guided Day Trip with Lunch from Paris
data.description: Audio Guided Tour from Paris to 2 Must See Sites: Giverny and Versailles in One day including lunch. You will discover one of the master of Impressionism's last home, sources of his finest works and his incredible gardens! Then you will appreciate the local French food in a charming country restaurant near Giverny. Explore Versailles Castles with Audio Guide with Priority ticket and admire its magnificent gardens at your own pace.

data.name: Guided Normandy D-Day Beaches Day Trip from Paris
data.description: Memorable day trip from Paris to visit the Normandy battlefields and landing beaches of World War II. Your guide will take you to famous wartime sites and also to the American cemetery.You will gain insight into the sacrifices of Allied soldiers and the French citizens they liberated.

data.name: Seine River Dinner Cruise, Eiffel Tower Access & Visit with Moulin Rouge Show
data.description: Experience the magical decadence of Paris! In one truly unforgettable night, Enjoy a Dinner Cruise along the River Seine taking in the spectacular monuments followed by a priority entry trip up the iconic Eiffel Tower to gaze upon the sparkling City of Lights. And complete your evening at the famous and flamboyant Moulin Rouge - French Cancan and champagne included!

data.name: Dinner and Show at the Moulin Rouge with Hotel Pickup
data.description: Experience French cuisine and culture as you discover the home of the Cancan in Paris while enjoying the cabaret of the Moulin Rouge. You have a choice from three different menus. Your tour includes hotel pickup by air-conditioned minivan from your central Paris Hotel.

data.name: Disneyland® Paris 1 Day Ticket with Transport from Paris
data.description:
Discover Disneyland® Resort, a Magical Kingdom not so far away - somewhere between a place where you wish upon a star and dreams come true, and classic Disney heroes and heroines live once upon a time in fairytales that are, happily, never ending.
Let yourself be amazed for a day by the unrivaled atmosphere of Disneyland® Paris and experience unforgettable moments in the company of
your favorite Disney characters. You will have the whole day to enjoy lots of attractions, shows and special events and to dive back into childhood!

data.name: Mont Saint-Michel Small Group Guided Day Trip from Paris
data.description: Expand your horizons with a day trip to medieval Mont St Michel, one of France’s most iconic attractions. Enjoy an intimate guided tour in small group, up to 15 people. This magical UNESCO World Heritage island is a step out of the ordinary with its famous gothic abbey and legendary stories. You’ll arrive after a scenic drive from Paris through the landscapes of Normandy, with a guide to brush up on your history. There’ll be plenty of time to explore the island, admire the bay views and do a little shopping.

data.name: Eiffel Tower, Seine River Cruise & Montmartre Small Group Visit
data.description:
The best way to discover Paris on a half day with a perfectly combined tour by air-conditioned minibus including pick up and drop from our central located agency in Paris.

You will admire the whole City from the Eiffel Tower, enjoy a River Seine Cruise bringing you to light the most amazing treasures of the French Capital such as the Louvre, Orsay museum , the Conciergerie, Notre Dame Cathedral...,and visit the Authentic Montmartre, Paris’ bohemian quarter where you have time to walk around and see its hilltop Basilique du Sacré Coeur.

data.name: Giverny and Versailles Small Group Day Trip from Paris
data.description: Art and splendor are on the agenda in this magical day tour from Paris, with the personal touch of a small group.  The inspirational beauty of Giverny begins your journey, with a trip to Monet’s house through the picturesque water lily gardens of his paintings, a visit of Monet's House. Authentic lunch at the charming Moulin de Fourges. The majestic splendor of Versailles Palace then awaits you, with a tour of its decadent highlights and breathtaking gardens.

data.name: Moulin Rouge Show including Champagne & Transport
data.description: Be dazzled with "Feerie", the latest Le Moulin Rouge show in Paris. With a half bottle of champagne and roundtrip hotel transfers, this is an experience not to be missed.

data.name: Paris Eclairs and Cream Puffs Small-Group Cooking Class
data.description: Learn the techniques and traditions of French pastry-making on this 3-hour cooking class in Paris. Follow step-by-step guidance from your instructor to make choux pastry and Chantilly cream. Master key skills such as ensuring an even rise in the oven and piping cream into your pastries. Make your own chocolate éclairs and cream puffs, they enjoy them over a cup of tea or coffee. Hear entertaining stories from the world of French pastry and enjoy personal attention from your instructor on this small-group tour, limited to eight people.

data.name: Neoclassical Paris Architecture 2-Hour Private Walking Tour
data.description: Have you ever thought of Paris as of a copy of another, older place? While being the most beautiful city in the world it is modeled after another, much older city. This private guided walking tour of neoclassical Paris takes you through an area that changed dramatically in the years prior to the French Revolution and makes you understand how the city of Paris is a reflection of the city of Rome. Explore the strict and sober elegance of the neoclassical style at Palais Royal, the Tuileries,  the Cour Carré and other important sites.

data.name: Paris to Normandy D-Day Landing Beaches Private Full-Day Trip
data.description: Discover Normandy D-DAY sites, known for landing operations from Allied to rescue Europe from Nazi invasion during World War II in 1944, and be part of history. Choose a private Chauffeur round trip transfer  in Normandy.

data.name: Paris Medieval Sightseeing Private Tour
data.description: Find out what was Paris was like 800 years ago on a private walking tour that takes you back to the early days of the city. See medieval monuments and learn about the history of the city during the Middle Ages at landmarks such as the Notre-Dame Cathedral and La Sorbonne, one of Europe’s oldest and most renowned universities.

data.name: Family Tour at the Musée d'Orsay
data.description: Offer your family a funny and educational experience by booking this tour at the Musée d'Orsay. Your children and yourself will discover magnificent 19th century architecture and one of the richest Impressionism collections alike! Your kids will be enthralled in a mystery-like visit which will let them both discover Monet, Renoir, or Van Gogh’s masterpieces and – most importantly - have fun!

data.name: Paris Highlights and Secrets Ultimate Bike Tour
data.description:
Not only will you see the iconic monuments of Paris - Eiffel Tower, Louvre, Orsay - but expect to be amazed by all the secrets Paris has to offer. Let your local guide take you through a perfectly designed itinerary, including a mix of history, engrossing stories and fun facts.

Use high-quality electrical bikes, change mode to adjust the power of the assistance. Follow your guide on these hidden winding or narrow streets of Paris that are often known only to the locals, encapsulating shining hidden treasures. The bike tour will also take you by unforgettable bridges, parks and much more that you wouldn't think about. Take time for great photos to make your travel memories last forever.

By the end of the tour, you'll be filled with fascinating stories and lesser-known fun facts that have shaped Paris over the years.

data.name: Private Reims Champagne with Minivan
data.description: This is an amazing full day tour combining the art of producing Champagne in the Epernay region and the history heritage of France in Reims.

data.name: The Impressionists at Orsay
data.description:
Located in a former train station, Orsay contains the largest collection of Impressionists’ paintings in the world. In this tour, you will explore the works of Edouard Manet, Paul Cezanne, Gustave Courbet, Edgar Degas, Claude Monet, Auguste Renoir, Alfred Sisley, and Vincent Van Gogh. During your private group tour not only will you explore an important revolution in French art history, but you will also experience captivating architecture that makes the d’Orsay Museum one of the world’s ‘must see’ museums.

Our knowledgeable tour guides will provide insight into the many personalities and artist’s temperaments behind the Realist, the Impressionist, and the Post-Impressionist movements. They will walk you through the many beautiful works and help build an understanding of how the first artist movements came about. Learn how these artists were a reflection of their time but yet still have an impact on contemporary art today.

data.name: 3hr - French Revolution Walking Tour for Families
data.description:
If you want to learn about the French Revolution but want to be sure that your kids will have great time, this tour is for you! Our passionate family-friendly historian guide will entice your kids with fascinating stories and facts. For 3 hours, your family will discover the evolution of the French Revolution and will relive major steps in a fun and entertaining way.

Thanks to an activity booklet, your kids will learn about famous characters and places of the Revolution. They will discover more about Danton, Marie Antoinette, Robespierre, and many more!

Buckle up for this live history lesson in the streets of Paris!

data.name: Paris by Night 2h Tour in Vintage French Car
data.description:
See Paris' heritage in vintage luxury open roof french Citroen. Explore the city during an unforgettable moment, and enjoy the most of it by cruising around the iconic Citroen Traction with retractable roof. Probably the best way to see Paris's most beautiful sights, such as Champs-Elysées, Eiffel Tower, Louvre museum, Montmartre, Latin Quarter, Moulin Rouge cabaret and other famous monuments!

Get insights tips from your knowledgeable guide! Sightseeing the city with class, seating at the back of your fully restored classic french car. Best value for money, as 4 people can fit all in 1 car.

Important notice: The itinerary of your tour may change depending on the traffic of the day, our drivers will do their best to adapt the route to show you as many monuments as possible, but we can’t guarantee you to see all the monuments stated on the list.

After booking, the supplier will coordinate the tour time based on when the request comes in.

data.name: Family Treasure Hunt in Montmartre
data.description:
Montmartre is one of the most well-known districts of Paris. It’s so pleasant to wander along its winding streets and to find intact the spots where great painters created works of art (Renoir, Picasso, Toulouse-Lautrec, just to name a few). But if this argument sounds weak to your children, why not offer them a kid tailor-made tour in Montmartre's village-like atmosphere.

Equipped with a personal activity booklet, which will keep them engaged during this 2-hour treasure hunt, your children will be guided by an art historian and experience a funny and historical adventure in Paris.

HIGHLIGHTS
• Offer your kids a 2-hour thrilling treasure hunt in Montmartre
• Learn about famous international artists such as Picasso, Dali, and more!
• Get the best view above the city, at the Sacré-Coeur hill

data.name: Paris Louvre Museum Italian Art 2-Hour Private Guided Tour
data.description:
By booking this 2-hour privately guided tour of the Louvre, you can avoid the overwhelming notion of exploring the enormous museum on your own and enjoy insight about the art, particularly the Italian art, with a personal guide.

The size of the Louvre museum are such that inspire awe. The largest museum in the world extends for 700 m along the Seine: a labyrinth of rooms. More than 35,000 artworks, it would take nine months to be able to view them all at once!

How to avoid the risk of wasting your ticket, spending hours and hours to wander the corridors exhausted without even being able, finally, to see the Mona Lisa? Don't panic and let yourself be driven by one of our tour guide.

We offer you an itinerary particularly focused on the Italian and French great masters: Canova, Michelangelo, Cimabue, Giotto, Veronese, Géricault, Ingres, David.

The Venus of Milo, the Nike of Samothrace and, of course, the Mona Lisa are always undisputed protagonists of our paths.

data.name: Perfumes of Paris : How did France become THE country of perfume
data.description:
What were the fashionable scents when Louis the XIVth was living in the Louvre? or when the "bourgeoisie" would go to the Opera in the early 20ies... ?

From the relationship of Parisians to hygiene in the past, to the most famous perfumeries, I'll take you for a unusual both historical and olfactory walk through the streets of the Saint-Honoré district.

Enough to switch on all your senses!

data.name: The Local Paris Experience: an off-the-beaten-track adventure!
data.description:
Been there, done that or simply curious to explore another side of Paris? The Local Paris Experience is tailored for you. Join our best local guides in their own neighborhood, explore areas most people would miss, taste genuine food specialties that are not on tourist menus and get to know the Paris hidden from guide books and tour operators.

On this off-the-beaten-path tour of Paris, we voluntarily do not name specific locations, sites or food as each tour is going to be different. The Local Paris Experience is unique every single time we run it, sincerely, and that's what makes it so much fun!

data.name: Photo shoot in the Eiffel Tower area
data.description:
-A private photoshoot with a professional photographer in the Eiffel Tower area. The experience lasts 1 h and involved walking.

-The recomended time for the photo shoot is early morning starting at 7AM/8AM/9AM (however other times are possible as well, just ask us when you send a request)

- From a one hour session, you can expect to have around 30 edited images, sent to you by e-mail.

-See the work on IG: sabine_dundure

data.name: Paris Museum Pass and Eiffel Tower Skip-the-Line Entrance
data.description: With only one booking, visit the most famous Monuments and Museums of Paris. The Museum Pass will grant you a priviledged access to 50 monuments and museums for 2, 4 or 6 consecutive days (depending on the option selected). This tour also include a skip-the-line entrance to the second floor of the Eiffel Tower.

data.name: Versailles Markets and Gardens Full-Day Bike Tour from Paris
data.description:
Here at Bike About, we’re a family. Our tours were one of the first to hit the Paris scene nearly 2 decades ago, and we like to keep that feeling of community on tour. For this reason, and unlike other bike tours of Versailles, we limit our groups to 14 people. We also warmly welcome you at our very own café, and our guide rides the train to Versailles with you- so you’re taken care of the whole way. Join our family for a day, and experience our version of Versailles!

We’ve planned an unforgettable day trip from Paris, cruising through the town of Versailles for the amazing local market, heading into Versailles’ grounds & gardens, Marie Antoinette’s village, and the Trianons. After the picnic, we make our way to the Chateau. You’ll then explore the palace at your own pace.

Our tour makes history accessible. It’s about getting the juicy important details of Versailles plus the fun stories and quirky anecdotes. It’s simply about an unforgettable day in the countryside, tickets included

data.name: Champagne & Loire Valley: double wine day tours from Paris
data.description:
This special pack is a great and discounted way for you to visit two of France’s most celebrated wine making regions: Champagne and the Loire valley!
* One day will be dedicated to the mythical region of Champagne to learn more about the world famous sparkling wine.
* The other day will be dedicated to the discovery of the majestic Chambord castle in the morning and of the Loire Valley wines in the afternoon.

Both days include multiple wineries visits with tastings, delicious lunches with local products, services of an English speaking and wine expert guide, hotel pick up in Paris and transportation in small vans (8 passengers max). At the end of both days, your guide will drop you back in central Paris.

data.name: Bike Paris treasures with a live guide - Families & Friends
data.description:
You dreamed of the city with Owen Wilson in the movie "Midnight in Paris" ? Time to make it reality ! Enjoy a leisurely bike ride through Paris iconic sights and after this vast overview you’ll be ready to dive on your own in the city.
Your 2 and half hours bike tour starts at the CIty Hall, heads toward St Louis and Cité islands, passes Notre-Dame and continues along the Latin Quarter.
Stroll with us along the river banks, old medieval churches and through charming squares.
Get to know the famous love lock bridge, the Louvre but also
trendy areas of Odéon and St Germain des Prés.
Meet the recently elected world best museum before enjoying a nice stop on the trendy river banks.
Back on wheels ... now what about Napoleon's grave, the romantic iron palaces or the square where Marie Antoinette was beheaded !!
Finally pass by the heart of the city with the first Kings palace.
Of course we'll share with you our best tips about restaurants, cafés, shopping & night life all along the tour.

data.name: Paris Private Tour in Vintage Car 2 hours
data.description:
See Paris' heritage in vintage luxury open roof french Citroen. Explore the city during an unforgettable moment, and enjoy the most of it by cruising around the iconic Citroen Traction with retractable roof. Probably the best way to see Paris's most beautiful sights, such as Champs-Elysées, Eiffel Tower, Louvre museum, Montmartre, Latin Quarter, Moulin Rouge cabaret and other famous monuments!

Get insights tips from your knowledgeable guide! Sightseeing the city with class, seating at the back of your fully restored classic french car. Best value for money, as 4 people can fit all in 1 car.

Important notice: The itinerary of your tour may change depending on the traffic of the day, our drivers will do their best to adapt the route to show you as many monuments as possible, but we can’t guarantee you to see all the monuments stated on the list.

data.name: Paris City Tour with Minivan
data.description:
We operate this 3,5 hours half day tour in the morning or in the afternoon.

A stunning and complete half day sightseeing tour of Paris in minibus. Constructed 2000 thousand years ago and divided in 20 districts, each one is a village with its own history and centres of interest.

After picking you up at your hotel with one of our 8 seated air conditioned Mercedes Van, our professional guide will drive you to discover the most famous one’s. You will be dropped off at your hotel or in the centre of Paris if you want to do shopping or to do anything else at the end of the tour.

data.description:
A full day dedicated to memory of the heroes of the last world war but also a charming visit of this Normandy region famous for producing cider, calvados liquor, the unrivalled Camembert cheese and historical medieval cities.

After picking you up at your hotel with one of our 8 seated air conditioned Mercedes Van, our professional guide will drive you to Normandy.

This is a private trip, meaning that you will on your own in the vehicle. You can decide the pace of the tour, its length remains the same.

data.name: Private Giverny with Minivan
data.description: Situated in Normandy, the village of Giverny is world-wide known for Claude MONET’s genuine and ladylike house and atelier. The gardens offer for the admiration of visitors the “painting of the nature” which Claude Monet’s contemporaries considered one of his masterpieces. Lastly, the water garden with its famous Japanese Bridge, its wisterias, azaleas and its pond has inspired the pictorial universe of the water lilies.

data.name: Private Paris Illuminations & Cruise with Minivan
data.description:
A stunning Paris City Tour at night to discover the majesty of the city of lights.
Constructed 2000 thousand years ago and divided in 20 districts, each one is a village with its own history and centres of interest.

After picking you up at your hotel with one of our 8 seated air conditioned Mercedes Van, our professional guide will drive you to discover the most famous one’s. During the tour, your will enjoy an 1 hour cruise on the Seine river.
You will be dropped off at your hotel or in the centre of Paris if you want to do shopping or to do anything else at the end of the tour.

data.name: Private Versailles with Minivan
data.description:
We exclusively operate with brand new Mercedes V class mini-vans and cars with hotel pickup and drop off.

Palace and Gardens entrance included in the price

data.name: Private Versailles Full Day with Minivan
data.description:
After picking you up at your hotel, and on your way to Versailles, your guide will tell you about the story of the Palace and how the “cour” was living during the Sun King reign.
With its three chateaux, gardens and parks, Versailles is an immense estate. Louis XIV the Sun King is the creative force of Versailles and turned Versailles into a sumptuous estate and the symbol of absolute monarchy in the 17th century.
You will visit the State Apartments with its 8 rooms, the Hall of Mirrors, the King and Queens’ apartments and the Hall of Battles with an audioguide.
Then stroll around the fountains and admire the water jets, explore the groves while enjoying live music concert from Lully (water jets from April to October on Saturdays and Sundays).
After Lunch (not included), you will visit the Grand Trianon also called the Marble Trianon and stroll in the Park to get in the new renovated “Domaine de Marie Antoinette” with the Small Trianon and the Hamlet Village.

data.name: Private Chantilly & Horse Museum with Minivan
data.description:
Château can be visited every day except on Tuesdays.

Chantilly is one of the most impressive palace and domain, jewels of French heritage. Ancestral home of the Prince de Condé and th Duke d'Aumale, it is set in 7800 hectares of forest. It contains remarkable furniture's collections from the 18th and 19th centuries. After visiting the Palace, you will see the Grand Stables with its living horse museum located in this biggest estate in Europe masterpiece of the 18th century.

data.name: Paris by Night Illuminations Tour and Seine River Cruise
data.description:
A stunning Paris City Tour at night to discover the majesty of the city of lights.
Constructed 2000 thousand years ago and divided in 20 districts, each one is a village with its own history and centres of interest.

After picking you up at your hotel with one of our 8 seated air conditioned Mercedes Van, our professional guide will drive you to discover the most famous one’s. During the tour, your will enjoy an 1 hour cruise on the Seine river.You will be dropped off at your hotel or in the centre of Paris if you want to do anything else at the end of the tour.

The gardens offer for the admiration of visitors the “painting of the nature” which Claude Monet’s contemporaries considered one of his masterpieces. Lastly, the water garden with its famous Japanese Bridge, its wisterias, azaleas and its pond has inspired the pictorial universe of the water lilies.

data.name: Les coulisses de l'UNESCO
data.description:
Grâce à votre guide conférencier, qui vous accompagnera pour cette visite insolite, vous explorerez la Maison de l’UNESCO (l’Organisation des Nations unies pour l'éducation, la science et la culture), dont l’architecture particulière donne tout son caractère à cet espace remarquable situé en plein cœur de Paris.

Tout en vous expliquant les missions, les projets et l’impact de l’agence spécialisée de l’ONU (l’Organisation des Nations unies), votre guide vous emmènera à la découverte des espaces incroyables du siège de l’UNESCO : ses immenses salles de conférences, hôtes d’évènements d’envergure internationale, le square où vous admirerez le célèbre Globe symbolique, ou encore ses passerelles et couloirs de béton, caractéristiques de l’architecture moderne.

Une collection d’œuvres d’art des plus grands artistes du XIXe siècle rythmera le parcours de votre visite guidée. Les œuvres de Calder, Picasso ou encore Giacometti, vous seront commentées par votre guide conférencier.

data.name: La Cavalerie de la Garde Républicaine - Quartier Célestins
data.description:
Edifié en 1895, le quartier abrite depuis cette date l'état-major et le régiment de cavalerie de la Garde Républicaine. Ses écuries accueillent aujourd'hui les 140 chevaux du 1er escadron et de la fanfare de cavalerie.
Vous commencerez votre visite guidée par la salle de traditions dédiée à l’histoire de la Garde Républicaine de 1802 à nos jours et aménagée dans une ancienne écurie.
Vous serez subjugués par la magnifique structure type Eiffel du manège où les cavaliers du quartier s'entraînent quotidiennement.
Votre guide vous détaillera au sein de la Grande Écurie et l’Écurie de l’Etat-major, les caractéristiques des majestueux chevaux. Une visite guidée insolite au cœur de Paris, des coulisses de la cavalerie de la Garde Républicaine !

data.name: Découvrez le monde de l'accordéon
data.description:
Venez vivre une expérience unique à Paris, plongez avec nous au cœur de l’instrument le plus emblématique de France : L’ACCORDEON.

Vous découvrirez l’histoire de l’accordéon, sa technique, lors d'une présentation ludique et vivante, dans laquelle nous démonterons un instrument devant vous pour tout vous expliquer !

Mais surtout VOUS en jouerez !
En effet nous allons vous mettre un accordéon dans les bras et vous apprendre, très simplement, les bases suffisantes pour découvrir le plaisir de jouer tous ensemble. Vous ferez l’expérience de « la boite à frissons » et de l’orchestre !

Enfin, autour d’un café, d’un thé ou d’un jus de fruit accompagné de viennoiseries, nous vous ferons une démonstration de quelques styles musicaux typiques du répertoire de l’accordéon, du bal musette des années 1920 à la chanson française des années 1980 en passant par le swing d’après-guerre.

data.description:
Profitez de votre séjour dans la capitale de l’Amour pour vous offrir un shooting photo. Découvrez ou redécouvrez Paris autrement durant une session d’1h30 en plein de cœur de la capitale sous nos objectifs.

Prenez contact avec nous. Nous échangerons par e-mail, téléphone ou skype pour comprendre ce que vous recherchez : demande en mariage, fiançailles, mariage, lune de miel ou tout simplement photo de couple.

Nous nous chargeons de vous préparer le shooting de vos rêves : sélection des lieux ainsi que le moment parfait de la journée (matin ou après-midi).

Nous vous remettrons l’intégralité des photos en version numérique via notre galerie privée ou bien via wetransfer sous 5 jours.

Nous réalisons également des sessions photo privées d’EVJF, grossesse, famille et d’anniversaire.

-vous souhaitez plus d’1h30 de shooting,

data.name: Paris Private Food Tasting Tour with a French Gastronomy Expert
data.description:
A 3 hours private food tour with some of the best artisans you can find in Paris. By choosing our private adventure you will explore an area of Paris and try several tastings with always the same rule : QUA-LI-TY.

Only sweet, sweet and savory, in the Marais, in Saint Germain....We will offer you different options : this is you who personalize the tour !

From pastries to cheese : this will be the best way to get immersed into the French culture !

data.name: Rodin Museum Paris 2-Hour Private Guided Tour
data.description: Take a trip through time at the Rodin Museum in Paris. Explore his unique vision of the world and of the human body and soul. This rare treasure is missed by many visitors!

data.name: Paris Marais Private Gastronomic Tasting Tour
data.description:
With a  flexible time departure, we will begin the tour in the Marais. So get quickly introduced to French specialties thanks to your passionate, local and private guide. 

During the tour you will have the opportunity to discover small artisans with a very traditional way to work. 

You will stop by 8 to 10 stops of some of Paris most fantastic shops ! While discovering the area you will for example try wines, cheeses, pastries, cured meat, the french baguette, jams and other great traditional french delicacy. This tour could also be the opportunity to taste chocolate and Macarons from renown chocolatiers. 

If you have any special request, do not hesitate ! We will be happy to try to make your dreams possible !

data.name: Fontainebleau and Barbizon Half Day Guided Tour from Paris
data.description: Transportation from Paris, with a professional guide, to discover the castle of Fontainebleau and the Barbizon village, by limited groups of eight people max. Entrance fees and audioguide included.

data.name: Perfume Workshop in Paris
data.description: Design your own personal fragrance in the Bastide, Molinard, in our boutiques or in the place at your convenience ! A Creation Molinard expert will interpret your flights of fancy, and help you to compose the perfect olfactory symphony... It’s rare to find a family business which has come down through the years with its enthusiasm and standards constantly renewed. Created in 1849, Maison Molinard is one of them. In Grasse, the world’s capital of perfume, five successive generations have handed on their emotions. Recognized by the highest distinction «Living Heritage Company», as a tribute to its rare and ancestral know-how, the company reinvents itself every day with the passion to create in inheritance.

data.name: Saint-Germain Flavors Sweet & Savory Food Tasting Tour
data.description:
Left Bank

In the romantic setting of Saint-Germain des Prés, follow your food-expert local guide, and enjoy 3 full hours of fun, tasting and surprises, in the maze of one of the oldest and most elegant areas of Paris.

Not only the 6th arrondissement is the most famous chocolatiers district in the world, but it is also a place marked by art and History, where several talented food artisans have decided to open their intimate and lovely stores.
• From the oldest Abbey of Paris to the biggest church of the capital, you’ll enjoy the unique beauty and flavors of Saint-Germain des Prés
• You’ll have 8 to 10 stops, both sweet and savory
• Small groups tours ensure you the best experience you can get!
• Chocolate, pastries, cheese, cured meats and wine on the menu…
• During the tour, you will have the opportunity to meet some of the most passionate and gifted food artisans of the capital.

data.name: Whisky Tasting - Discover Scotch
data.description: The heart and home of whisky, Scotland offers an infinite range of flavours and aromas. To initiate or rediscover the basics of whisky, come and taste our 100% Scottish selection. From beginner to expert, Scotch whisky will win over even the most sceptical ! 5 whiskies to taste, guided and explained by our whisky expert.

data.name: Private Loire Valley Castles with Minivan
data.description:
A wonderful day in the Loire Valley Region located at 100 miles far from Paris. Our guide will pick you up at your hotel early in the morning around 7.15 am to allow you to spend a full day in this charming French “province”. It is called the “Valley of the Kings” as this valley was much loved by the Kings of France from the time of the Capets in the 11th century and then the Valois and the Bourbons up to the 19th century.
In total there are 25 palaces built by the kings and embellished with parks and gardens of which the most famous : Chenonceau, Amboise and Chambord you will visit.

data.name: Paris City Sightseeing Tour by Classic 2CV Car
data.description: The Paris “Classic” day tour in 2CV is designed to let you discover the most beautiful monuments of Paris

data.name: Eiffel Tower Skip-The-Line Second Level Access by Elevator
data.description: Beat the queues to one of Paris’ top attractions on this skip-the-line Eiffel Tower tour in Paris. The Eiffel Tower is widely considered among the world’s most famous landmarks and the entrance queues can be long. With your skip-the-line entry ticket, head directly to the elevator and up to the second floor to begin exploring with a guide. Admire panoramic city views from your vantage point up the tower and gain insight into Paris’ rich history. Afterward, perhaps head up again to the top floor (own expense).

data.name: Parcours Bois de Vincennes - Visite de Paris en Segway
data.description:
Ce circuit de 2h30 vous permettra de sillonner l’un des deux poumons de la capitale. Au menu : mise au vert et sensations de glisse !
Baladez-vous dans les sentiers du Bois de Vincennes, découvrez le Land Art et les paisibles Lacs de Daumesnil et des Minimes.
Des pauses sont prévues : La Grande Pagode et le Temple romantique de l’île de Reuilly.
Points forts : Le « Segway cross », le land Art, le lac de Daumesnil et le surprenant Jardin Tropical.

data.name: Paris Segway Tour with Eiffel Tower Ticket and Summit Access
data.description:
The best two things to do in Paris !
- Go to the top of the Eiffel Tower by lift (skipping the line at the ticket office) and visit one of the most famous monuments in the world.
- discover Paris streets with a fun and self balanced machine: a Segway

data.name: The Incredible Flyover
data.description:
From the FlyView terminal in the heart of Paris, embark on the first immersive flight experience of Paris.

Put on your jetpack (flight simulator), fasten your seatbelt, and slip on your virtual reality headset. Take-off is imminent! In just a few seconds, you will find yourself above the rooftops of Paris!

Paris and its famous monuments are yours to discover: the Eiffel Tower, the Arc de Triomphe, Notre Dame de Paris, the Champs Elysées... as you have never seen them before. The 360° views of Paris and the feeling of flying are breathtaking!

Your adventure is not over yet: now you're off on a unique trip around the world!
Fly over 7 dream destinations with breathtaking 360° views: the Great Wall of China, Victoria Falls in Africa, the Angel Falls in Venezuela, Lake Baikal in Russia... a real travel experience!

data.name: Latin Quarter 2-Hour Private Walking Tour
data.description: Why is this ancient part of Paris called ‘le Quartier Latin’? Visit the true gem of several layers of history, on a private guided walk and get an idea of what the city looked like during the Middle Ages. As one of the oldest remaining parts of the city as well as a university center of Paris, it's a place where history and youth come together in a unique urban synthesis.

data.name: 6-Hour Private Custom Tour of Paris
data.description: See the top attractions of Paris as well as off-the-beaten-path sights on a private tour with a personal guide. Designed for those with a limited amount of time in the city who want to see as much as possible, this tour can be customized to take in the historical and cultural landmarks that interest you most. Select between a car tour and walking tour when booking.

data.name: Segway tour Paris
data.description: Les circuits en Segway constituent une manière unique et la façon la plus drôle de découvrir les plus beaux sites du centre historique de Paris. Si vous avez toujours rêvé de voler sur un tapis volant, une balade en Segway va vous combler. Vous allez glisser au-dessus du sol et vous faufiler en un instant partout où le cœur vous en dira dans les rues agitées de Paris, et votre guide va vous montrer les plus beaux endroits et les curiosités de la ville.
