data.name: Bateaux Parisiens Seine River Sightseeing and Dinner Cruise
data.description: Combine a glamorous dinner in Paris with sights of the city's must-see attractions on this evening sightseeing cruise down the River Seine. While relaxing on board your Bateaux Parisiens boat, enjoy a 3-course meal from an à la carte menu, listen to music and watch sights like the Eiffel Tower, Notre Dame Cathedral and the Louvre as you cruise by!

data.name: Segway tour Monumental
data.description: Les circuits en Segway constituent une manière unique et la façon la plus drôle de découvrir les plus beaux sites du centre historique de Paris. Si vous avez toujours rêvé de voler sur un tapis volant, une balade en Segway va vous combler. Vous allez glisser au-dessus du sol et vous faufiler en un instant partout où le cœur vous en dira dans les rues agitées de Paris, et votre guide va vous montrer les plus beaux endroits et les curiosités de la ville.

data.name: Wine Tasting In Paris
data.description:
The owner of the wine place, Thierry is a French certified sommelier ( WSET level 2 and 3) and a wine instructor for Burgundy wines. ( fluant in English)
This Wine Tasting tour In Paris is the best way to discover French Wines with an English-speaking wine expert. During more than 2 hours, without leaving Paris, you will discover the most famous wine regions of France and taste 6 excellent French wines: 1 Champagne, 1 white wine from Loire Valley, 1 white wine from Burgundy, 1 Red wine from Burgundy, 1 red wine from Bordeaux, 1 red wine from Rhone Valley.

You will also learn how to taste wine like a real wine expert. This wine tasting takes place in small groups of maximum 12 people in a charming place located in the heart of Latin Quarter.

If you want to buy a small cheese platter to pair with your wines , please tell us in the comment section  when you book (12 euros for 4 cheeses - payment on arrival)

data.name: Segway tour Capital sites
data.description: Les circuits en Segway constituent une manière unique et la façon la plus drôle de découvrir les plus beaux sites du centre historique de Paris. Si vous avez toujours rêvé de voler sur un tapis volant, une balade en Segway va vous combler. Vous allez glisser au-dessus du sol et vous faufiler en un instant partout où le cœur vous en dira dans les rues agitées de Paris, et votre guide va vous montrer les plus beaux endroits et les curiosités de la ville.

data.name: Paris Night Segway tour
data.description: Les circuits en Segway constituent une manière unique et la façon la plus drôle de découvrir les plus beaux sites du centre historique de Paris. Si vous avez toujours rêvé de voler sur un tapis volant, une balade en Segway va vous combler. Vous allez glisser au-dessus du sol et vous faufiler en un instant partout où le cœur vous en dira dans les rues agitées de Paris, et votre guide va vous montrer les plus beaux endroits et les curiosités de la ville.

data.name: Picasso Museum Paris 2-Hour Private Guided Tour
data.description: Enjoy a 2-hour private guided tour of Paris’s Picasso Museum. Delve into the life and work of one of the world’s most prolific artists, and feast your eyes on some of his principal works – housed in a splendid 17th-century mansion.

data.name: Bateaux Parisiens Seine River Lunch Cruise with Live Music
data.description:
Treat yourself to an elegant lunch in Paris with this 2-hour afternoon sightseeing cruise down the Seine River. Aboard your Bateaux Parisiens boat, relax over a 3-course French meal while enjoying music and fantastic views of Paris' most iconic attractions including the Eiffel Tower, Notre-Dame Cathedral, Louvre Museum and the Musée d'Orsay. A choice of seating options and wine selections are available when booking.

Information about the health pass on voucher

data.name: Marais semi private walking tour
data.description: This is a unique opportunity to learn about one of most important, layered, historically diverse and, in the last couple of decades, chic areas of Paris. We go through different stages of development of Marais, not leaving anything behind. On this visit, you will learn about the Jewish community and the Knights Templar; about the time when Marais was a fashionable neighborhood for opulent, yet restrained and elegant aristocratic abodes; when it fell from grace and was a working class, often dangerous place to be; how it was embellished, gentrified and how ultimately rose back to prominence. Not to leave anything out, you will also learn why it is one of most popular parts of the city for the Parisians too, not just for the tourists.

data.name: Perfume Workshop VIP in Paris
data.description: Design your own personal fragrance in the Bastide, Molinard, in our boutiques or in the place at your convenience ! A Creation Molinard expert will interpret your flights of fancy, and help you to compose the perfect olfactory symphony MOLINARD... It’s rare to find a family business which has come down through the years with its enthusiasm and standards constantly renewed. Created in 1849, Maison Molinard is one of them. In Grasse, the world’s capital of perfume, five successive generations have handed on their emotions. Recognized by the highest distinction «Living Heritage Company», as a tribute to its rare and ancestral know-how, the company reinvents itself every day with the passion to create in inheritance.

data.name: Paris Moulin Rouge Cabaret Show with Champagne Only or Dinner
data.description: The Moulin Rouge is the number one show in Paris, if not the whole of Europe. No wonder it sells out quickly! Don't miss your chance to see the world-renowned showgirls and French Cancan dancers strut their stuff on the Moulin Rouge's historic stage.

data.name: Paris only KOMBI tour
data.description: Tailor made tours/itineraries of Paris in our VW vintage Kombi with sunroof. Your driver Chris is a born and raised Parisian. Totally bilingual (French/English). Our van is perfect for groups 4 to 7 passengers. Perfect for families. You can all be in the same car. It is a great way for you to discover and learn about Paris with a local.

data.name: Lido de Paris "Paris Merveilles" Early Show with Champagne
data.description:
Enjoy an evening of glitzy, glamorous cabaret at Paris’ brand new Lido de Paris "Paris Merveilles" show. Head to the city’s famous Avenue des Champs-Elysées and discover a world of decadent dancers, sparkling sequins, extraordinary sets, magical lighting and captivating music. With the delectable Bluebell girls on stage and talented chefs producing delicious dishes in the kitchen, take in the sights and sounds of one of Paris’ newest and most impressive cabaret performances. Dreamlike and tantalizing, the show's sets offer a tour de force of imagination and excitement!

Lido de Paris is free for children under 11*
*Not applicable for special nights like Christmas and New Year's Eve.

data.name: Paris: Charming Nooks and Crannies Bike Tour
data.description:
Enjoy a 3-hour, small-group bike tour and explore the beautiful charms of Paris on a fun and leisurely bike ride.  Cruise with local guides who show you nooks and crannies and explains historical context and anecdotes. Discover Saint Germain des Prés, The Latin Quarter, Odéon and Luxembourg, the forever trendy central areas. Cycle flat routes on mostly low-traffic side streets for a full immersion with locals.

Explore The Marais, the medieval district with its Jewish and gay areas, the first King squares and get to know the medieval Latin Quarter and its roman roots

data.name: Paris Small-Group Walking Tour
data.description: Wander through the luxurious, hidden streets, garden & passages of Paris with a local. Savour a sugary-sweet macaron at a popular Parisian food shop. Enjoy the elegant surroundings of the Louvre’s garden. Admire medieval & renaissance-era architecture. Become a cheese connoisseur at a Parisian fromagerie. Experience the bustling vibe of a busy French market as you become a Parisian for a day. This small group tour is limited to maximum 12 guests.

data.name: French wine and cheese tasting in Paris
data.description:
Join us for this two-hour tantalising taste experience as you taste your way through five French cheeses, expertly accompanied by five French wines from some of the most famous wine regions in the world!

Learn cheese and wining pairing tips, discover how to taste wine like a professional, listen to countless stories & gain expert knowledge that will leave you feeling like a true expert.

data.name: Pastry & Chocolate Family Tour in the Marais
data.description: Are you dying to taste all the famous sweets from around France, but simply don’t have the time? Fret not, because this tour has it all! Take your kids on a treasure hunt through the charming Parisian distract of le Marais and taste sweet specialties from all over France. Yum! At the beginning of the tour, your children will receive a map of France with the various regions. They will then become detectives and will have to find their way through le Marais to locate the places where you will be able to taste the regional specialties. At the end of the treasure hunt, a chocolate heaven is waiting to reward you all! Here your kids will unleash their creativity by decorating a dessert. Last but not least, they will receive a certificate as a French Regional Sweet Specialties Connoisseur. Super cool, right?

data.name: The Ultimate Tasting class: 10 cheeses paired with 10 wines
data.description:
Taste 10 wines paired with 10 cheeses in a stunning historic cellar : a unique experience in Paris.

The Ultimate Tasting class is THE MUST DO experience for wine and cheese lovers. It takes place 10 minutes by foot from the Louvre in a former royal cellar.

During this tasting, you'll get the chance to discover a large selection of wine representative of the French Terroir animated by an enthusiastic wine expert.

data.name: Palace of Versailles Skip-the-line Tour
data.description: Discover the Palace of Versailles and skip the long lines at the entrance with this 90-minute guided tour. Choose the time that better suits your program and make your own way to Versailles. Your guide will take you on an unforgettable tour of the Hall Of Mirrors and State Apartments. Stroll around the famous French gardens at your own leisure after the tour (additional entrance ticket required on musical or fountain show days).

data.name: Paris Cheesemaking Workshop w/Wine and Cheese Tasting
data.description:
Learn the art of cheesemaking with true experts in a professionnal environment! Leave this 2h workshop with the knowledge of doing it again at home! Come with all your question about cheeses, the expert will also make you discover the wonders of french cheeses, having a glass of wine in the hand ;)

This will be a fun and educational experience including a wine and cheese tasting.

data.name: French Gourmet Cuisine: Dinner and Wine Pairing
data.description: Enjoy a 3-course dinner featuring contemporary French food and fine wine on an evening in Paris! Taking place in an atmospheric wine restaurant near the Louvre, the meal is cooked by a passionate and talented young French chef. Each haute cuisine course is matched with a glass of wine, plus you'll enjoy a glass of Champagne to start and a digestif to finish!

data.name: Normandy 2-Days Discovery Trip with D-Day Beaches & Mont St Michel from Paris
data.description: Spend two days exploring France’s Normandy and Brittany regions on this tour from Paris with an overnight stay in Caen. Visit the beautiful historic cities of Rouen and Honfleur, and tour World War II sites including the infamous Normandy D-Day landing beaches and the Normandy American Cemetery and Memorial. The next day, venture to the beautiful walled port city of Saint-Malo, followed by a tour of Mont St-Michel, one of France’s most iconic attractions. Overnight accommodation, dinner & breakfast, entrance fees and transport are included.

data.name: Jeu de piste historique dans la ville de Versailles
data.description:
Nous nous sommes inspiré d'une véritable enquête au coeur de l'affaire des poisons, qui n'a jamais été résolue
​​

data.name: Giverny Private Tour: Monet's House & Garden
data.description:
Our Giverny Private Tour is a wonderful half-day tour to explore the village where Claude Monet bought a beautiful house and grew an impressive flower & Japanese garden that served as inspiration for multiple of his works. Our private tour of Giverny is the best way to enjoy a day trip from Paris, including private transportation and skip-the-line tickets, in the company of a professional local guide.

Monet’s House & Garden only open to the public during the summer season. Therefore this tour is only available in the summer.

HIGHLIGHTS
Skip the long lines and get straight into the flower garden & Japanese pond.
Discover the intimate home & life of the world’s most famous painter.
Soak up the atmosphere of the birth place of Impressionism.
Enjoy & feel free to ask all questions to your private local guide.

data.name: Catacombs of Paris Semi-Private VIP Restricted Access Tour
data.description: This VIP semi-private tour allows you to skip the long lines and unlock gates to hidden rooms in the Paris Catacombs. Join a small group of 7 people or fewer and an expert local guide, and discover the mysterious secrets buried under the streets of Paris.

data.name: Paris & Parisians During WWII | Private Walking Tour
data.description:
Our WWII private tour focuses on the life of Paris under the 4 years Nazi occupation.

Discover how Paris was ruled by the German troops, what were the Jewish question & policy, who took part in the 'French' Resistance and hear about the 5 day of the Battle and Liberation of Paris.

Your guide are passionate and knowledgeable local experts who will make History come to life, sharing family memories and local stories that go way beyond simple facts and figures.

During this tour, you'll cover different subjects such as :
Paris City Hall & German occupation
Jewish families & Holocaust memorial
French Resistance & Deportation memorial
Battle of Paris & Liberation Day in August 1944

data.name: Paris at Christmas with The Louvre, Champs Elysees & Arc de Triomphe
data.description: Spend a full day exploring the best of Paris at Christmas time. Start your day on a small group tour of the world famous Louvre Museum, home to the Mona Lisa and countless other sublime treasures. Then head outdoors to see the sparkling lights on the Champs Elysées - one of the most recognizable avenues in the world - stroll past the dazzling storefronts, savor delicious French macaroons from Ladurée and end your tour on the top of the Arc de Triomphe, for some of the best views over the glittering City of Lights.

data.name: Tour in a vintage car with a Parisian
data.description:
You may have been to Paris several times or you may simply want to see something else than the touristy parts of it ? The unsuspected tour was created for you !

Our idea is to give you the opportunity to visit our city with a local !  

To make sure that your experience is perfect, he will compose your tour considering your personal taste and expectations. 

Pick up and drop off at your hotel.

You’ll discover aspects of Paris that you never knew existed !

data.name: Paris' Left Bank: Private, Guided Paris History Walking Tour
data.description:
Discover the treasures of the Left Bank of Paris, the city's Latin Quarter & St Germain-des-Prés.  This private tour will take you to visit some of the loveliest treasures of the Left Bank.
- The city's oldest church, as well as a later church from the baroque period.
- Roman ruins - the few remaining vestiges of the Romans in Paris including thermal baths & the remains of an arena
- See where the Revolutionaries gathered & plotted their insurrections in 1789.

Commentary provided by a trained historian that will provide insights into the historical & archaeological context of this unique area of Paris.

data.name: Escape game Vaudou
data.description: L'Antichambre vous propose les meilleurs escape games d'Europe en plein cœur de Paris. Une aventure passionnante et bien réelle à vivre entre amis, en famille ou avec vos collègues. Nos maîtres du jeux sont formés pour vous faire vivre un moment sympathique, ludique et magique pour que ce soit vous les stars de votre escape game !

data.name: Tootbus Paris Christmas Lights Tour
data.description:
Come and experience Paris dressed in sparkling lights!

During Christmas, Paris at night is wonderfully illuminated giving the city a magical and unique atmosphere.
Let yourself be carried by the magic and romance of Paris, sit back relax and enjoy the show from the open top of an electric green bus. We will take you past Opera, Place Vendôme, Concorde, Champs Elysées, Eiffel Tower, Louvre Museum, and the big department stores and many more!

A unique 1.5hrs tour around the 'City of Light', which will be sure to get you into the Christmas spirit.

Share this special moment with your love ones whilst listening to our amazing audio commentary including traditional Christmas songs.

All tickets include complementary individual earphones, a blanket, and sweets for kids.

data.name: Versailles Minivan
data.description:
After picking you up at your hotel with one of our 8 seated air conditioned Mercedes Van, our professional guide will drive you to Versailles and will tell you about the story of the Palace and how the “cour” was living during the Sun King reign.

With its three chateaux, gardens and parks, Versailles is an immense estate. Louis XIV the Sun King is the creative force of Versailles. He turned Versailles into a sumptuous estate and the symbol of absolute monarchy in the 17th century.

Palace and Gardens entrance included in the price.

data.name: Versailles Palace, Gardens and Estate Skip-the-Line 1-Day Tour
data.description: Explore the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Palace of Versailles (Chateau de Versailles) and the Versailles Gardens (Jardins de Versailles) on a full-day tour. As you wander through the Versailles Gardens, your expert guide will bring French history back to life and also explain the stories behind Marie Antoinette's Estate (Grand Trianon and Queen's Hamlet). If you happen to be there on a Sunday, take the opportunity to watch the amazing fountain show in the gardens.

data.name: Versailles Palace and Gardens Skip-the-line by Train from Paris
data.description:
Enjoy an easygoing escorted train ride from Paris to Versailles in small group and get priority entrance to the Palace. Discover the opulent apartments and impressive Hall of Mirrors. In the palace, enjoy a 90-minute tour with a professional guide.

Then, admire on your own the massive French Gardens. According to the program, you may enjoy the Musical Gardens or the Musical Fountains Show.

Spend as much time as you wish before returning to Paris.

data.name: Private Paris city tour with Minivan
data.description:
We operate this 3,5 hours half day tour in the morning or in the afternoon.

A stunning and complete half day sightseeing tour of Paris in minibus. Constructed 2000 thousand years ago and divided in 20 districts, each one is a village with its own history and centres of interest.

After picking you up at your hotel with one of our 8 seated air conditioned Mercedes Van, our professional guide will drive you to discover the most famous one’s. You will be dropped off at your hotel or in the centre of Paris if you want to do shopping or to do anything else at the end of the tour.

data.name: French Revolution Truth & Myths Private Walking tour
data.description:
Our French Revolution Revealed private tour is the ideal way to explore Paris in a fun and smart way, understanding one of the most complex episode of Modern History.

Walk the very steps of Queen Marie-Antoinette & Robespierre, understand how the French society was shaped back then and unravel the truth of the false.

Your guide is a fun and knowledgeable local expert who will show you that once again, true historical facts and witty comments can be much better than a Hollywood-style simplification of History.

data.name: Chantilly Private Excursion
data.description: This lovely domain, albeit bearing the name of whipped cream (chantilly in French) is all about the horses. Traditionally, this domain is dedicated to horse breading and horse races – one of the greatest horse racing events, prix de Dianne, is annually held here. The culture, the heritage and the history of this unique place all revolve around horses – so much so, that the legend of the princes of Condé is woven with their presence, actual and symbolic.

data.name: Virtual Room Paris - 1ère expérience de réalité virtuelle en équipe
data.description:
Vous voyagerez aux limites de l'espace et du temps, dans une expérience inédite au cœur de Paris.

Vivez le meilleur de la réalité virtuelle collaborative, dans une salle spécialement conçue et équipée des dernières nouveautés technologiques.

À vous de relever le défi pour partager d’intenses moments de complicité, mesurer votre réactivité, votre esprit de déduction et de coopération.

Et si l’avenir du monde était entre vos mains ?
Pour le savoir, constituez dès maintenant votre équipe et rejoignez l’aventure !

data.name: Workshop in Paris: Create your Own Parfum
data.description: This workshop allows perfume fans to create their own scent and to be taught to the different concepts of composition. Participants are driven by a perfumer (a nose) (20 years of experience) and they play with a range of about 50 different compositions to create there scents. Participants will compose 3 scents as a sample and then select one to carry with them in a 50 millilitres bottle. This is an artistic experience, an exciting moment of creation.

data.name: Bruges From Paris All Day Guided Private Tour
data.description:
Visit the Venice of the North during one exceptional day.
In the winding streets in the historic heart of the city, our guide will explain the history of the Flemish region and especially Bruges, a World Heritage site.
As you listen to the commentary, you will admire this medieval city which has preserved all the splendour of its original architecture: the Grand-Place and belfry, palaces.
During summer, you will also ride on the famous, romantic canals, and thus observe the city, a genuine open-air museum, from another point of view.

data.name: Louvre Museum Admission Ticket and Audio Guide
data.description:
With the customized audio guide with 37 points of interest, some before entering the museum, you’ll have a very deep introduction of one of the biggest museums of the world. Our audio-guide is in 10 different languages and has also a version for child.
Pick up your entrance ticket for the Louvre with the audio devices and the Cruise tickets at our agency few minutes from the museum. This tour gives you the possibility to cancel 24 hours prior the tour with no fees, normally the Louvre tickets are not refundable.
Your audio tour includes all the museum’s highlights, including the enigmatic Mona Lisa, the Winged Victory of Samothrace and the imposing Venus de Milo.
When the comments end you can enjoy more of the museum at your own pace.
The cruise ticket can be used any day during your visit

data.name: Versailles Palace and Trianon Guided Day Tour with Lunch in Gardens from Paris
data.description:
The chateau and gardens of Versailles are absolute must-sees beyond Paris.
Relive history at the time of the Sun King thanks to this full day passport, accompagnied by your Private Professionnal Guide. This expert will give you the keys to understand and visualize why this building is part of the World Heritage of Humanity.

You will be amazed by Louis XIV's splendour passing through the worldwide known Hall of Mirror : host of the most important figures since the XVII° C. Admire the Royal Apartments and the Stabling facilities. Then, step into Marie Antoinette's life discovering it's Trianon and estate.

Discover the marvelous French Style Gardens imagined by the master Le Notre. You will be impressed by the work of perspective, the magnificent fountains shows and great spaces.

If you admire great work of art, sumptous baroque, history and legacy; this tour is your.

data.name: Paris to Mont Saint Michel Private Day Trip with Chauffeur
data.description: Take a day trip and discover Mont-Saint-Michel, the “Wonder of the West” - a beautiful bay and island in Normandy, home of the monastery from which it takes its name. Visit on your own with a private chauffeur.

data.name: Croisière de Paris - le dîner festif avec chanteurs live
data.description:
With this cruise, enjoy an unique concept in Paris ! A 2 hours Seine river cruise, a cooking show with a tasting menu around 10 small dishes with a lounge singer and a DJ Live.

With your friends or in family, come and enjoy an unique and exceptionnal night. You will be in the beautiful boat dining room. A cruise barge with a yacht appareance, with a careful design and futuristic lines, a modern warm and refined decoration : a beautiful bridge - terrace where you will taste your 10 small dishes menu.

Your tasting dinner will be make up a 3 entrances plate, a workshop "Main courses" when you will taste 4 differents tastes and a workshop "Deserts" to discover 3 differents refined deserts. The drinks including depend on the formula selected (3 choices formulas).

A lounge singer and a DJ Live will insure the musical atmosphere that will progress during the night, relaxing during the cruise and finish by a dancing night until 0:30am.

data.name: Monet & Rodin Skip the line Private Tour with a Local Expert Guide
data.description:
Monet & Rodin

Not only were they two of the most important artists for Modern Art, they were also two great friends who respected and loved to challenge one another.

On this unique private tour, you will gaze at paintings of Claude Monet at Orsay and see how they converse with the vision of Nature of Auguste Rodin.

This wonderful experience will take you to an Artistic journey like no other, exploring the very place where Art was changed for generations and understanding how Paris became the cultural center of the world.

data.name: Flyview : Pack 2 experiences
data.description:
Enjoy freely and plainly an unforgettable VR experience through our pack of two optional choices.
Once warmly welcomed by our team at the FlyView Paris facilities check-in desk, you will have the opportunity to choose your favorite package among a variety of outstanding options.

data.name: Fort Boyard Helicopter Scenic Tour
data.description: You will take off from the airfield Rochefort Charente-Maritime for an exceptional 20 minutes ride where you will get an overview of the Ile Madame and three forts: Boyard (known worldwide for its television game), La Pointe and Lupin. You can also admire some great landscapes of land and water mixture.

data.name: Sainte Chapelle, Louvre & Tuk Tuk Ride Family Tour
data.description:
This 5-hour Express Family Tour takes you to the Sainte Chapelle before starting a thrilling Treasure Hunt in Le Louvre and boarding a tuk tuk for an amusing 60-minute ride to sightsee the iconic Paris monuments.

IMPORTANT NOTE: this tour doesn't include access to the Leonardo Da Vinci exhibition occurring at the Louvre between October 24th 2019 and February 24th 2020

data.name: Small-group round-trip transfer from Paris to Bayeux
data.description: You forgot your driver license at home? Enjoy a worry-free transfer day-trip from Paris to Bayeux, a small medieval town, capital of Bessin, who was liberated on June 7th of 1944 right after the allied landings. Make the most of your free time on site, to explore on your own this beautiful small town and surroundings and organize your time as you please.

data.name: 3H Grand Paris Tour in 2CV CITROEN
data.description:
You are in Paris for a short period of time and do not know where to start from ?

Paris has so much history, world famous monuments and different neighborhoods to visit. You think you do not have the time to visit them all ?

The 3h Grand Paris tour will help you out. It is the most complete tour that will give you a real taste of Paris and cover all aspects. You will be also able to take a break at any sightseeings to take beautiful captures for your best memories.

The itinerary combines the most famous monuments, as well as the hidden gems in the middle of the local french areas, from St Germain des prés to Ile de la cité, Le marais, all the way up to Montmartre.

Thanks to its small size, the 2CV allows us to go via the narrow adjacent streets where touristic buses cannot go.

Of course, you will can customize the itinerary to your preferences.

data.name: Chef at home
data.description: Enjoy a cooking class in Provence and a wonderful meal.We will combine fun cooking, gathering in cheerful atmosphere, great wine tasting and sharing an unforgettable moment in Provence

data.name: Traversée de Paris en Segway
data.description:
Avec parcours de 4h00 en Segway, vous découvrirez les magnifiques sites et monuments bordant la Seine

Des arrêts photos sont prévus, afin d’immortaliser vos instants au sein de la ville lumière!

Pause déjeuner : 45 minutes environ.

Points forts : Tour Eiffel, Musée du Quai Branly, Centre culturel et nouvelle église Orthodoxe Russe, Pont Alexandre III, Petit et Grand Palais, Invalides, Notre-Dame, l’Ile Saint-Louis.

Tous nos tours sont privatisables.

data.name: Street Art tour in Paris - Discover Paris murals !
data.description:
With this 2,5 hour and 8km tour, you will cross in Segway a modern district of Paris (off the beaten tracks!). You will discover many murals, including the monumental ones of Obey (Shepard Fairey), Tristan Eaton, Invader, Inti, Seth, Okuda...

After this tour, Street Art will have no secrets for you!

data.name: Location de bateau électrique Ruban Bleu ACE
data.description:
Découvrez Paris sur l'eau sans un bruit ! C'est une manière unique de profiter des joies de la
capitale, entre amis ou en famille.

data.name: Three Hour Marais Tour
data.description: Come take an insiders stroll through the lovely Marais, one of the oldest and historical areas of Paris. Marais expert Richard Nahem (he has lived in the area since 2005) will share with you breathtaking, historic buildings and private mansions dating back to the 1600s, beautiful manicured parks and gardens and some of the finest galleries and small, jewel-like museums. Discover the city’s chicest home and clothing boutiques and food lovers can feast at some of the top food shops, patisseries, and chocolate shops. The tour also includes a visit to the Jewish Quarter exploring synagogues, the Shoah Memorial, and the tasty Jewish food shops. Enjoy this unforgettable tour of a truly magical part of Paris. Tour includes a stop at an award winning bakery for a pastry and a coffee. (Not included in price).

data.name: Paris Hidden Montmartre Small-Group Walking Tour
data.description: Explore the cobbled streets of Montmartre, the fabled 2,000-year-old district that was once home to the world’s leading artists. Taste one of the best butter croissants in all of Paris. Find one of the best (and little-known) panoramas in Paris for a perfect city shot. Discover the Sacre-Coeur Basilica from a different angle. Stumble upon the last remaining vineyard in Paris, opposite one of its most iconic cabaret clubs Agile. This small group tour is limited to maximum 12 guests.

data.name: Scavenger Hunt in the Covered Passages of Paris
data.description: Discover the Covered Passages of Paris with this kids scavenger hunt! Your kid-expert guide has lost a special treat for your children in the covered passages of Paris. In this scavenger hunt, your kids will have to follow clues to find magical numbers hidden in the covered passages while your guide tells you all about the rich history around you. After you have completed the scavenger hunt, your children will be rewarded with a sweet treat, and you can all enjoy a warm drink in a typical Parisian café with your guide!

data.name: Paris Seine River Lunch Cruise
data.description: Enjoy this two-hour cruise and discover the magic of Seine as you pass by some of the most prestigious historical monuments in the heart of Paris. You can also enjoy some traditional French cuisine on board.

data.name: Paris Wine Tasting plus Cheese & Cured Meat Lunch with an Expert Sommelier Guide
data.description:
Enjoy a wonderful wine tasting in Paris with an expert sommelier guide. Taste wines from regions such as Bordeaux, Sancerre and Rhone, and listen as your guide takes you through the wine-tasting process and offers interesting insight into the wine regions of France. Combine your wine tasting with samplings of delicious cheese and charcuterie (cured meats like sausage and ham). Relax in an elegant wine cellar right in the heart of Paris and enjoy this delicious lunchtime tour!

THIS TOUR IS ONLY AVAILABLE ON ENGLISH.

data.name: Paris to Giverny Round-Trip Transfer with Skip-the-Line Ticket

data.description:
Want to please the whole family but are hesitating between a walking tour, a sweet tour, and a chocolate tour? Look no further because we have the perfect solution: a tasty Sweet and Chocolate Treasure Hunt in the elegant Saint-Germain-des Prés district. This mouthwatering fun and delicious tour includes 10 tastings and will culminate in being rewarded with your customizes chocolate bar!

You’ll meet your kid-friendly foodie guide in front of Saint-Germain-des-Prés church, a district housing the best Parisian chocolate craftsmen and pastry brands. Throughout the visit, your children will be engaged in a treasure hunt to discover the next shop where you will savor some of the best French delights: macarons, caramel, and various types of chocolate!

data.description:
This 2-hour Family Treasure Hunt in Le Marais has been designed to ensure great fun for the whole family while discovering a historic district of Paris. As sharp as detectives, your kids - accompanied by a kid-friendly historian - will have to solve riddles and enigmas along the way. From the oldest medieval remains in town to the Jewish community of Paris’s fate during WWII, your kids will gain a deeper understanding of Le Marais’s significance on the history of Paris.

HIGHLIGHTS
• Experience a 2-hour playful walking tour in Le Marais
• An activity booklet to engage the kids throughout the tour
• Tour with a kids expert who knows how to make history come alive

data.name: Eiffel Tower Dinner with Seine River Cruise and Moulin Rouge Show
data.description: Experience the magical decadence of Paris! Discover the mythic Paris by night in one truly unforgettable night, you will enjoy a 3 Course Dinner and visit the Eiffel Tower with its Breathtaking Views! Marvel Parisian monuments from above and from the River. Complete your evening at the famous and flamboyant Moulin Rouge - French Cancan show and champagne included!

data.name: Paris to Loire Valley Chateau d'Amboise and Chinon Winery Tour
data.description:
The history of the Château d'Amboise dates back to the 11th century, when
the Count of Anjou built the castle on the promontory, surveying the Loire River, as a defence strategy. Between the 15th and 16th centuries , under the orders of Charles VII, Louis XII and Francois I, the castle was refurnished. Its magnificent facade can be attributed to Charles VIII and Francois I, and their love for Italian art and style. It was because of this passion for Italian art that Francois I invited Leonardo Da Vinci to come and reside in Amboise as his first painter, architect and engineer. Da Vinci arrived in 1516 and spent the remaining three years of his life living and working in the nearby Chateau du Clos Lucé (connected to the royal chateau by an underground passage). Leonardo Da Vinci died in Amboise and was buried in the Chapel of Saint-Hubert (on the ramparts of the Chateau d'Amboise).
Visit few wineries and enjoy a delightful 3-course lunch during this wonderful tour.

data.name: Private Orangerie Museum 2-Hour Guided Tour in Paris
data.description: This 2-hour private guided tour to the Orangerie Museum will intrigue you, for sure. An official skilled guided will introduce you to the culture and artists of the end of the XIX century: Modigliani, Renoir, Picasso, Soutine and many more, but we will also talk about the mystery of the Collection and the extraordinary life of Coco Chanel.

data.name: Private Tour of Saint Germain des Pres
data.description: St. Germain des Prés is one of the most beloved areas of Paris. As a former hub for writers and artists like Hemingway, Picasso, and F. Scott Fitzgerald in the 1920s, it still has a unique, carefree vibe that is unparalleled. From its lavish 19th-century Belle Époque–style buildings to its top antiques and contemporary art galleries, to its famous people-watching cafés, St. Germain des Prés is the quintessential Paris experience. Tour also includes a visit to the magnificent Luxembourg Gardens, the 17th century St. Sulpice Church, the second largest in Paris (also written about in The DaVinci Code), a bakery known for its scrumptious macaroons, and a stroll down a street known for its cafes and delicious food shops.

data.name: Marais Gallery Walk - Private Tour
data.description:
Explore Paris’s vibrant contemporary art scene with a walk through a selection of Marais galleries. Your visit will include the top Parisian international galleries, alongside the lesser known art spaces. Your guide, a passionate art insider, will share with you insights on the history of the galleries, artists and areas you will be visiting. Develop your taste, define your opinions and expand your knowledge on what you like with a member of the Parisian arts community.

Along the way, you will learn about the history of the neighbourhood, its hidden spots and local treasures. Get to know the Marais like a local.

MiniMe Paris has been recognized and featured in international magazines such as Vogue, ELLE and we also co-branded with DisneyLandParis, Barbie or Emoji. data.name: Explore Le Marais like a local - Private walking tour
data.description: To every Parisian, Le Marais is a dream place to live and be. Comes with us to understand what attracts locals here so much that tourists don’t know about yet. We will keep no secrets from you and open doors as we wander through cobbled winding streets and aristocratic mansions. data.name: Fontainebleau private excursion
data.description: Fontainebleau is a unique castle – very large, built and rebuilt in different times, it is a veritable patchwork of architectural styles and different eras that have profoundly marked the history of France. Walking through the castle is like walking to a set of time capsules, each of them representing a certain era, connected to a historically significant individual – most of French history condensed in one site. Also, the forest and the gardens are worthy of admiration in their own right.

data.name: Notre Dame, Sainte-Chapelle, and Conciergerie Walking Tour
data.description:
Join us as we take a tour through the heart of Paris right where it all began. Views of Sainte-Chapelle, the Conciergerie, and Notre Dame Cathedral await you on Ile-de-la-Cité.

While walking along the cobbled streets of the island, you'll hear about the chapel of Sainte-Chapelle, one of Paris’ hidden gems. Originally commissioned by Louis IX to be a home for the Crown of Thorns and 1,100 stained glass windows.

From there, we’ll make our way to the Conciergerie, a prison used during the French Revolution for those awaiting the guillotine. You'll learn about famous inmates, like Marie Antoinette, while learning about how this building was used throughout the centuries.

Finally, we’ll enjoy a beautiful view of Notre Dame, France’s greatest example of Gothic architecture. Due to a fire in 2019, we will not be able to go inside the Cathedral, but your guide will lead you through the amazing history of this church.

Learn all about the greatest wines of France and the main French wine regions from your expert sommelier guide. Soak in the palace’s Baroque architecture, admire the rooms full of art and see how some of the most infamous members of nobility really lived. At a top-rated winery, learn about the traditional Champagne-making process and sip several different kinds of the beloved bubbly paired with a gourmet multi-course lunch of traditional delicacies. It’s a fantastic way to experience the one and only home of authentic French Champagne.
You will visit three different champagne tastings and have a lunch at the local restaurant.

data.name: Discover the secrets of the Louvre
data.description:
Skip the long admission queues at Paris’ Louvre Museum in a private group tour. Don’t miss the essential famous works and the hidden treasures with an experienced guide. See the Victory of Samothrace, Leonardo da Vinci’s Mona Lisa, the Venus de Milo, the French Romantic period and more. Enjoy the world’s most popular Museum with a small, personal guided tour. Our tours of the Louvre are with locals, who like the many poets and artists of the past still use the Louvre as a source of inspiration and a tool for study.

Discover the history of the palace as an artist studio and a salon. Explore the history of the museum’s construction adjacent to the city’s medieval boundary wall. While admiring a selection of artifacts on display, learn how the many objects came to the Louvre and how they continue to enrich our understanding of the international cultural community.

data.name: The Impressionists at Orsay - skip the line
data.description:
Located in a former train station, Orsay contains the largest collection of Impressionists’ paintings in the world. In this private group tour, you will explore the works of Edouard Manet, Paul Cezanne, Gustave Courbet, Edgar Degas, Claude Monet, Auguste Renoir, Alfred Sisley, and Vincent Van Gogh. During your tour not only will you explore an important revolution in French art history, but you will also experience captivating architecture that makes the d’Orsay Museum one of the world’s ‘must see’ museums.

Our knowledgeable tour guides will provide insight into the many personalities and artist’s temperaments behind the Realist, the Impressionist, and the Post-Impressionist movements. They will walk you through the many beautiful works and help build an understanding of how the first artist movements came about. Learn how these artists were a reflection of their time but yet still have an impact on contemporary art today.

data.name: D-day Normandy Tour with Local guide and pick up from your Hotel in Paris
data.description: Discover Normandy through the eyes of a professional touristic local guide and learn about the events of the Second World war that marked that region forever.Enjoy a pickup from your Paris hotel and let our chauffeur drive you to Bayeux, where the D-day tour will get started.Arriving in Normandy, your  guide will join you and make you discover during 3 hours, and within a group of 15 persons maximum. First visit : the Pointe Du Hoc, a construction of fortifications designed to try and prevent an Allied landing in the west.Then set foot in Omaha Beach, and discover why it is most known as “Bloody Omaha”. Lastly you will enter The American Cemetery and Memorial of Colleville-sur-Mer, where 9386 service men and women are resting in peace after the battle of summer 1944.

data.description: Scale the heights of Paris in Montmartre, 500 feet above the city, with breathtaking panoramic views. data.name: Small-Group D-day Normandy Tour with Audio guide and hotel pick up from Paris

Be immersed in the event of the D-day of 1944, discovering this historical region with our audio-guide. Let it guide you through the Sainte Mère Eglise, Pointe Du Hoc and discover its secrets at your own rhythm. You will then discover Omaha beach, where the American soldiers landed on June, 6th of 1944 to free the area from the German Army. Nearby, visit the American cemetery and Memorial of Colleville-sur-Mer, the first American cemetery on European soil in World War II, which honor the service, achievements and sacrifices of U.S. armed force.

data.shortDescription: Whether you want to start skateboarding, learn to master a trick or just have a session, skateboarding lessons are for you!

data.name: Paris Opera Garnier After-Hours Guided Tour
data.description:
Like all sumptuous and famous places, the Palais Garnier has its mysteries, myths and incredible stories.

This is the angle from which we propose to approach this jewel of architecture. Your guide will narrate its history through the story of Erik, the mysterious man with a hideous face, more well-known under the name of the Phantom of the Opera. Having made the opera his home, the Phantom knows its entire history and can recount 1001 anecdotes and other curiosities.

The short story by Gaston Leroux will thus serve as a thread throughout the visit, leading you beyond the great chandelier, stall No. 5 and the angel of the music, to reveal unsuspected splendours.

data.name: Paris Opera Garnier Walking Tour with Admission
data.description: Explore the decadent Opera Garnier in Paris on a 1.5-hour, comprehensive walking tour. Designed by French architect Charles Garnier in the late 1800s, this incredible Neo-Baroque opera house is one of Europe’s largest and is sure to leave you awestruck with its elegant interior. Explore the auditorium, main staircase (Grand Escalier), Grand Foyer and Member’s Rotunda with your expert guide, and hear how the building inspired the setting for the legendary ‘Phantom of the Opera’ musical.

Plus, receive a ticket to take a boat ride on the River Seine at your leisure meaning that after our tour you will have a chance to see Paris from another angle!

data.name: Private Covered Passages & Palais Royal Gardens 2-Hour Tour
data.description: Discover the covered passages of Paris on this private walking tour with an insider guide. See hidden arcades that date back to the 19th century, admire the iron and glass architecture, and enjoy the 'secret' atmosphere of a different side of Paris.

data.name: Paris Sightseeing Highlights Tour by Dutch Bike
data.description:
Would you like to discover Paris in a different way than by bus ? Join our bike tour and discover the Highlights of the city in a different way. Biking through Paris is the best way to get around the city and see things that you wouldn't see otherwise. And to give you the best experience possible, we provide you with a trained guide who will speak your native language and real confortable Dutch bikes ! Oh Yeaaaah!

After the tour, you can also rent a bike to explore the city on your own (for this you will need a credit card).

data.name: Make Your Own Bottle of Wine in the Center of Paris
data.description: Enjoy a 2-hour winemaking workshop in a breathtaking 18th century royal cellar in the center of Paris. With your personal winemaker, you will learn how to make your own wine and design a label for your bottle. A unique experience and a must-do for any wine lover.

data.name: 2 parties de lasergame de 20 minutes
data.description:
Alliant stratégie et activité physique, ce jeu vous permettra de passer un bon moment de convivialité entre amis ou en famille.

Chaque partie dure 20 minutes pendant lesquelles il faut "toucher" le plus grand nombre de personnes et éviter les "tirs-lasers" des adversaires afin de marquer un maximum de points.
Equipés de gilets dernière génération pour une expérience renforcée, vous évoluerez dans deux labyrinthes dessinés spécifiquement pour ce genre d'activité atypique !

Accessible dès 6 ans.
Pour petits et grands, sportifs et non sportifs.

Il faut être un minimum de 6 personnes afin de réserver une partie !

À savoir que les groupes ne sont pas mélangés et que vous serez entre vous, dans un labyrinthe privatisé.

data.name: 2 hour outdoor group activity in Paris: PARIS, MON COEUR
data.description: Foxtrail is unique. During the activity you will encounter permanent installations that the fox has hidden around the city. They combine creativity with technology, producing fun and original challenges. Clues will require both intelligence and teamwork to solve, similar to an Escape Room. However you are free to complete the trail at your own pace, so you can fully appreciate the sights and unexplored corners of the city you will discover along the way.

data.name: ClueZ Paris Tour
data.description:
Put yourself in a detective team’s shoes and discover the history of Paris in a fun and entertaining way.
- Start from 10am to 6pm every day
- 1h30 to 2h time enigma
- 1 last generation digital tablet
- 1 to 6 investigators per team
- As of 90€ per team / tablet

data.name: 1 partie de lasergame de 20 minutes
data.description:
Alliant stratégie et activité physique, ce jeu vous permettra de passer un bon moment de convivialité entre amis ou en famille.

Chaque partie dure 20 minutes pendant lesquelles il faut "toucher" le plus grand nombre de personnes et éviter les "tirs-lasers" des adversaires afin de marquer un maximum de points.
Equipés de gilets dernière génération pour une expérience renforcée, vous évoluerez dans deux labyrinthes dessinés spécifiquement pour ce genre d'activité atypique !

Accessible dès 6 ans.
Pour petits et grands, sportifs et non sportifs.

Il faut être un minimum de 6 personnes afin de réserver une partie !

À savoir que les groupes ne sont pas mélangés et que vous serez entre vous, dans un labyrinthe privatisé.

data.name: Explore Montmartre like a local - Private walking tour
data.description:
• Walk in the steps of world class painters like Monet, Picasso or Van Gogh
• Revive parties at the Moulin Rouge with Toulouse-Lautrec and Cancan dancers
• Explore the picturesque back-alleys of a village lost in the capital city
• Discover the Bobos’ way of life, so uniquely Parisian and amazing food stores
• Admire Sacre Coeur Basilica ( Sacred-Heart)  and Paris’ most stunning city view

data.name: Orsay Museum Private Tour - Skip the line & Local expert guide
data.description:
- Private 2.5 hours tour of the Musée d'Orsay.
- Skip the long lines and meet face to face with the masterpieces of Impressionism.
- Discover the secrets of Manet, Van Gogh and Monet and what makes their Art Revolution.
- Explore the world's most inspiring art at your own pace.
- Enjoy & feel free to ask all questions to your private local guide.
- Morning or afternoon tour – choose what is best for you!

data.name: Explore the Latin Quarter like a Local - Private walking tour
data.description:
• Walk in the steps of world class writers like Hemingway, Sartre, Albert Camus or Victor Hugo
• Explore the picturesque back-alleys of the Medieval part of Paris
• Discover the oldest student neighborhood with la Sorbonne University
• Admire the Pantheon, where our french heroes are buried

data.name: Italian dinner on the river Seine
data.description:
The first italian diner on the River Seine with Ludovic Bicchierai, world champion 2016.
Discover Paris with a tour on the Seine.

data.name: Montmartre semi private walking tour
data.description: Montmartre is unique in so many ways, and we aim to acquaint you with every single one of them. During this tour, you will learn about its religious history; its rural, agricultural history; about that time when it was an important piece of the revolutionary puzzle, and a site where the fate of the city and indeed the country was decided; about that time it was all the rage among the 19th century hipsters and turn of the century artists. Throughout all these, very different eras, Montmartre maintained its original character and the seemingly eternal tendency to never fit in. Take stroll down the history lane of this ever exciting and vibrant quarter for a truly authentic experience.

data.name: Normandy Private Excursion
data.description: The D-day is today seen as  one of the turning points of the World War II, as well as the largest military operation in history of warfare. The largest intervention of the joint Canadian, British and American forces, it was a massive debarquement on the beaches of Normandy, filled with German forces that were waiting for them. What ensued was a bloody and desperate battle where tens of thousands of lives were lost on both sides. This tour is not only a visit of the most important sites where these battles took place, but also the glimpse into a very complicated situation in the World War II and France’s actual role and position in this war.

data.name: Montmartre Private Walking Tour
data.description: Montmartre is where expressionism, Can-Can and ‘bistro’ were created. Wander the artistic streets of Montmartre on a 2-hour private tour of Paris, and discover the legends of the most bohemian neighborhood in the city. Follow in the footsteps of Impressionist painters, and learn how the area was once a smugglers’ den.

data.name: Le Marais Private Walking Tour
data.description: The most layered quartier of Paris, possibly one of the most charming as well. Explore the Marais on a private guided walking tour and learn how a former slum can become the most chic place in the world. Learn about its past and visit sites such as Les Halles, Place des Vosges, and the Pletzel area – the historic center of the city’s Jewish community.

data.name: Eiffel Tower Second Floor Access Guided Visit
data.description: Meet your guide at the departure point in the morning to pick up the ticket, and start your tour with a visit to the Eiffel Tower. Head up the famous tower with the guide. Hear great stories from your guide while you reach to the second floor.

data.name: Louvre Museum Skip-the-line Ticket & Seine River Cruise
data.description:
Head out for your river cruise ride for 1 hour on the city's romantic Seine. See the best parts of the City of Light from the tranquil water, and enjoy great tidbits from your audio guide.

With the world-famous Louvre Museum fast entrance ticket, skip the lines and head into this maze of art and culture in the center of the city. See whether Mona Lisa is smiling, marvel at amazing paintings, and walk among sculptures.

data.name: Eiffel Tower Summit Entrance and Champagne Experience
data.description: It is one the unique experience where the customer will enjoy the illumination of Paris sipping a glass of Champagne

data.name: Eiffel Tower 2nd Floor Skip the Line Ticket by Elevator
data.description: Don't wait to get inside the most famous tower in the world and skip the long waiting lines to step directly in the elevators.

data.name: Versailles Palace Private Half Day Guided Tour from Paris
data.description: Enjoy a private visit of the Palace and the Gardens of Versailles with the company of a fun and knowledgeable guide. Discover and explore on a half day tour all the stories and all the rooms of this world heritage classified monument.

data.name: Disneyland Paris 1 or 2 Parks Ticket with Transfer from Paris
data.description: Come and spend a marvelous day in Disneyland Paris, with a full-day ticket to 1 or 2 parks. Transfer from central Paris and enter a magical world, full of fun for all the family. Meet your favorite Disney characters, and enjoy the rides and attractions at your own pace.

data.name: Eiffel Tower Guided Tour with Louvre Museum Ticket and Seine River Cruise
data.description:
Enjoy the adventure of triple attraction in Paris !!!

Start your tour by Guided Eiffel Tower (Guided on 2nd floor only) visit through the top floor (if option selected) and marvel by the fascinating view from the "Iron Lady"  then go for a river cruise ride for 1 Hour on the Seine River and complete your journey with Louvre Museum visit.

This Package gives you a 1 hour Guided Eiffel Tower Visit  + 1 Hour Seine River Cruise Ticket + Louvre Museum Entrance Tickets

data.name: Eiffel Tower Skip-the-Line Ticket with Summit Access & City of Lights Paris View
data.description: Avoid any hassle to purchase the Eiffel Tower summit acces pass with this prepaid ticket and get the entrance for the Elevators without waiting in ticket line to buy. On the second floor change elevators and, after a short elevator ride, get to the stunning view of the top floor.This is the highest place in Paris and the view from there is breathtaking, don´t miss out the opportunity.

data.name: Paris Wine and Cheese Pairing Small-Group Experience
data.description: Perfect for wine and cheese lovers, this 1.5-hour tasting allows you to try four wines from four different French wine regions paired with various cheeses. This small-group activity takes place in a charming authentic wine shop in the Latin Quarter and has a maximum of 12 participants. This is the perfect lunch break you need when you are in Paris.

data.name: Location de bateau électrique Ruban Bleu Scoop
data.description: Découvrez Paris sur l'eau sans un bruit ! C'est une manière unique de profiter des joies de la capitale, entre amis ou en famille.

data.name: Paris to Versailles Round-Trip Helicopter Tour
data.description:
Take to the skies above Paris on a helicopter tour to Versailles! Soar over the Seine River, Bois de Boulogne and incredible Versailles Palace before landing near Versailles to enjoy a complimentary drink, take photos in front of your helicopter and learn about flying from your pilot. On your return flight to Paris, enjoy bird’s-eye views of Trocadéro, Montparnasse, La Défense and the Eiffel Tower in the distance. 
* In the case of bad weather, the flight may need to be rescheduled for an alternative date. Please book your flight for one of the first days of your stay in Paris in order to allow for possible rescheduling.

data.name: Private Tour: 2CV Paris City Highlights Tour 45m
data.description:
Feel like a unique visit, source of good mood, sharing and the unexpected?
Re-discover the charms of Paris through a mind-blowing visit, in one of the most legendary convertible cars! Welcomed by a knowledgeable, kind and elegant chauffeur, dressed in the famous Saint James smock, you’ll enjoy the funny, unprecedented anecdotes, shared with passion. Wonderful avenues, famous monuments…. go with the flow of the must-see sights of the capital, from the soft seats of this iconic French car.

• An enhanced course, through the most beautiful sites of the Capital
• A comfortable vehicle, equipped with cushions, covers and opening hood
• A private chauffeur, in love with the city and passionate about history
• Possibility of adapting the itinerary, depending on your desires

data.name: Versailles Private Excursion
data.description: See Versailles, a unique estate that was made to owe and impress with its sheer size, stature and magnificence. Walk through its many rooms and corridors, especially the well-known Hall of Mirrors, and find out first-hand about the most extravagant and decadent period of the entire French history. The true value of this visit, however, is the domain; as it is more important that the castle. The garden and the estate of Versailles, more so than the chateau, were made to impress with its many fountains, alleys, separate gardens and artificial lakes. They are there to be admired and that is exactly what we are going to do. The duration of the tour is barely enough to go through all of the domain's layered and interesting history.

data.name: Moulin Rouge Late Night Show with Champagne
data.description: Paint the town red and enjoy the glitz and glamour of the cabaret on this 2-hour late night show at the Moulin Rouge in Paris with Champagne. Watch world-renowned showgirls strut their stuff on stage. Marvel at dazzling costumes, fabulous stage design and spectacular show tunes. Sip Champagne and soak up the atmosphere in this historical cabaret venue. Pick up your ticket to the hottest show in town and make the most of your vacation time in Paris. Hurry, shows sells out quickly - make sure to book early for an evening full of excitement!

data.name: Atelier 2 - Ouverture et profondeur de champ
data.description: Grâce aux cours pratiques et techniques, nous espérons transmettre des savoirs précieux pour évoluer avec plaisir en numérique comme en argentique. Nous proposons également une large palette de formations thématiques autour de la photographie ancienne et des techniques historiques et alternatives.

data.name: Versailles: Food & Palace Bike Tour
data.description:
-We are amongst the few licensed to guide you inside the Château not abandon you with an audio. We mic up so you don't miss a thing!
-We visit: the Château, Royal Gardens, Fountains, Marie Antoinette's Hamlet
-We are local to Versailles, it is our home town!
-See more with ease by bike and access places the crowds do not.

data.name: Louvre Museum Skip the Line Must-Sees Guided Tour
data.description: See some of the greatest artworks in the world - housed in the world’s largest museum - in the most effortless way possible!  The Louvre museum attracts around 15,000 visitors each day, and with almost 10 miles of corridors, its galleries display more than 35,000 works of art.  It’s easy to feel overwhelmed by such a visit, but our expert guide will lead you through the many rooms and show you the very best of the collection. We’ll skip the lines and navigate seamlessly through the crowds in order to make the most of your visit to this spectacular museum.

data.name: Freestyle scooter course in Paris, Skatepark Jules Noel
data.shortDescription:
These courses, which are aimed at beginners and young children from 6 years old, take place in the Jules Noël skatepark in the 14th arrondissement of Paris. For children aged 10 and over, we offer street scooter courses.

Your child will learn freestyle scooter in a fun way in one of the biggest skatepark of Paris. The teachers are qualified and passionate about their job, and are used to working with children. All the exercises will be approached in the form of games adapted to the level of each child.

The Jules Noël skatepark covers an area of 1300 m² (20 m x 65 m). It is equipped with a funbox comprising two inclined planes, two curves, a handrail and another curve. There is also a 1.80 m quarter, a 1.80 m inclined plane and a corner. All of this is made of wood.

Programme

Meeting either at 12pm at the PSC office (26 Rue au Maire, 75003 Paris), or at 1.30pm, directly at the Jules Noel skatepark.

- Opening of the skatepark. Once all the students are present, you will put on your equipment: protections, helmets, etc...
- You will start the warm-up and listen to the safety instructions
- You will start the course. You will learn the basics, new tricks, the instructor will show you how to position yourself on your scooter
- This time, the course will take place in the form of games, challenges...
- You will discover the skatepark and all its obstacles. You will enjoy a free session with the instructors.
- End of the day at the skatepark

For children who wish to take advantage of the accompanying service, the return to the PSC premises is planned for 6pm.
