data.name: Paris to Versailles half day trip
data.description:
The Palace of Versailles is a must-see of Paris region, but you are not sure how to get there ? You also would like to enjoy a beautiful ride through the royal forests of Louis XV ?
The 2CV is a great car to discover Paris, but it’s also an amazing way to go to the most beautiful castle and region of Paris.

This 5h tour combines the visit of the Ile de France region.
The tour will start from your hotel in Paris. We will drive through all the different arrondissement to get to the bottom of the Eiffel tower. We will cross the beautiful residential of 16th arrondissement before to cross the Bois de Boulogne along the racecourses.
We will then drive through the Royal forests of Saint Cloud before drop you off at the entrance of the castle of the Sun King.

You will have 2h30 to visit the mysterious Hall of Mirrors, the impressive gardens and its majestic fountains.
After the visit of the royal palace, we will head back to Paris before to drop you off back at your hotel.

data.name: Classic Tour of Paris in 2CV CITROEN
data.description:
First time in Paris ? Or do you want to discover Paris under a different angle ?

The classic tour is just the perfect way to see the Beauty and history. Whether it is for a special occasion with your love, a stroll during the sunset or at night after dinner, either ways will guarantee an unforgettable experience.

This 1H tour is the best seller tour, thanks to its itinerary carefully designed to show you the most famous monuments that makes the renown of Paris.

It will give you a great overview and orientation of the city to prepare the rest of trip. I will also share with you many recommandations adapted to your needs to spend a wonderful Parisian journey.

data.name: Lot Valley and St Cirq Lapopie Tour by Citroen 2CV from Cahors
data.description:
Nous commencerons notre journée à Cahors.
En plein centre-ville, le mercredi et le samedi matin, cette place est couverte d'étals aux couleurs vives formant l'un des plus beaux marchés du Sud-Ouest.
Nous allons obtenir des produits locaux pour préparer ensemble un pique-nique du marché de Cahors.

Nous traverserons ensuite la vallée du Lot et ferons notre premier arrêt au village médiéval St Cirq Lapopie, élu village préféré des Français. Vous pourrez vous promener dans sa rue pour comprendre pourquoi ce village a attiré tant d'artistes depuis la fin du 19ème siècle. Vous apprécierez également la vue suspendue au-dessus de la rivière Lot.

Nous roulerons ensuite sur une route bordée de falaises qui serpente en amont pour vous emmener dans la vallée du cele et nous arrêterons pour installer notre pique-nique le long de la rivière dans un endroit unique.

Nous rentrerons vers Cahors par la paisible vallée de Célé montrant ses impressionnantes falaises calcaires imposantes d'un côté.

data.name: 2CV tour by night
data.description:
We pick you up and drop you off anywhere in Paris.
Therefore all our tours are tailor made and your itinerary will depend on your "knowledge" of Paris and what you wish to see.
Our five guides are born and raised Parisians and they all speak good English.
Each of us owns his car, we love them and that's why we're the only ones without any marking or advertising on our cars (way better on the photos!)
We pick the best time slots traffic wise.
We know great anecdotes & funny facts which we love to share.
We hope to see you soon!

data.name: French Wine and Champagne Tasting in Paris
data.description: Expand your knowledge of French wine with an evening of wine tasting in a beautifully renovated cellar in central Paris. Taste six French wines from different regions including Rhone, Bordeaux, Sancerre and Champagne. Delight your senses as your expert sommelier teaches you some of the best wine-tasting techniques and shows you how to read a French wine label. Enjoy cheese or charcuterie to accompany your wine (if option selected). This relaxing and informative session is an ideal way to learn all about French wine – you will leave with a whole new level of confidence and expertise.

data.name: Paris Seine River Bateaux Mouches Early Evening Dinner Cruise
data.description:
Enjoy this 1-hour and 15 minutes cruise on the River Seine which is including a delicious dinner menu. See the enchanting city of romance all lit up in the evening.

Please note that for groups (more than 15 people) a unique choice of menu is compulsory.

data.name: Gothic Paris - Castles & Cathedrals (Marais History Walk-Small Group Tour)
data.description:
This is a private tour of the remnants of "old Paris" - the city that existed in the Middle Ages and Renaissance, the city of hidden castles, imposing renaissance palaces & baroque mansions, medieval timbered houses, leafy courtyards hidden behind carriage doors, charming squares & public fountains.

You will learn about the city's history, its rich architectural & cultural background, through researched commentary developed by a historian. Learn how the city was transformed (1853-1870) from a medieval warren of densely overpopulated streets to a modern city with broad avenues, city squares & parks, trees....and the world's 1st system of gas lighting.

You will also see firsthand the nuances of Gothic vs Baroque architecture & art. By visiting the mansions & churches of the Marais we will see the transition from medieval Gothic to renaissance Baroque architecture & discover the rich past (and present) of this picturesque & trendy neighbourhood.

data.name: Private Loire Valley Castles with Minivan
data.description:
A wonderful day in the Loire Valley Region located at 100 miles far from Paris. Our guide will pick you up at your hotel early in the morning around 7.15 am to allow you to spend a full day in this charming French “province”. It is called the “Valley of the Kings” as this valley was much loved by the Kings of France from the time of the Capets in the 11th century and then the Valois and the Bourbons up to the 19th century.

In total there are 25 palaces built by the kings and embellished with parks and gardens of which the most famous : Chenonceau, Amboise and Chambord you will visit.

You will on your own in the vehicle, meaning that you can decide the pace of the tour. Its length remains the same.

data.name: Skip the Line: Eiffel Tower Tickets and Small-Group Tour
data.description:
Book your skip-the-line ticket to the summit of the Eiffel Tower and leave the long queues behind! This is a fully escorted tour by an English-speaking expert guide, who will lead you all the way to the 3rd (and highest!) level of the Eiffel Tower. Before exploring, your guide will entertain you with interesting anecdotes and facts about the tower and its architecture, including stories about the various wedding proposals and publicity stunts the tower has hosted over the years.

With a choice of departure times during the day as well as an evening or sunset viewing (varies according to the time of year), your skip-the-line tour offers the most flexible and enjoyable way to visit this must-see Paris landmark. You will have time to walk around the levels at leisure, taking in the breathtaking Paris cityscape from this unique vantage point! If you're looking for a more intimate group, opt for our small group option!

data.name: Skip the Line: Small-Group Eiffel Tower Sunset Tour
data.description: Enjoy a spectacular sunset from one of the world’s most iconic landmarks, the Eiffel Tower (Tour Eiffel)! A skip-the-line ticket means you will avoid the infamously long queues that can normally take up to two hours. Your expert guide will explain the fascinating history of this Paris icon as you walk around the first two levels. As the sun sets over Paris, enjoy the spectacular views and take advantage of many wonderful photos opportunities. For a convenient and relaxing way to enjoy the Eiffel Tower, this skip-the-line ticket is a must-have.

data.name: Paris Sunrise tour by Segway
data.description:
Have you ever dreamed having Paris just for you? With this "Sunrise Segway tour", you will discover Paris early in the morning. You will enjoy the magnificent sunrise on the Trocadero Square with the Eiffel Tower in the background and enjoy the Champs Elysees. We reserve you many other surprises on this circuit of 12km !
Original memories guaranteed.

data.name: Paris Highlights Private Tour
data.description:
Visit Paris with a local guide and get the most out of our city;

Learn the secrets of Paris architecture at Notre Dame, Louvre or Eiffel Tower;

Explore local neighborhoods out of the beaten path and try local food specialties in Saint Germain, the Latin Quarter and Champs Élysées;

Get the most amazing views over Paris and skip the long lines at the Arc de Triomphe;

And understand why the Eiffel Tower has become such a world icon and the secrets of its construction from the mesmerizing Trocadero Plaza.

data.name: Giverny and Monet's Garden Tour
data.description:
To begin your Giverny and Monet's Garden Bike Tour you will travel from Paris to the quaint town of Vernon, located in Normandy. On the way, you will pass beautiful wheat and sunflower fields, far from the hustle and bustle of Paris.

We will make our first stop at the open-air market in Vernon. Here, you can enjoy an array of local specialties, such as cider, and organize your picnic basket for the perfect riverside lunch.

We will then pick up our bikes and enjoy an effortless cruise from Giverny to Monet's famed-estate. We'll stop along the way for that picnic lunch, all while appreciating in breathtaking views of the French countryside.

You will have plenty of time to explore Monet's gardens and home in Giverny, and then we will enjoy a leisurely ride back to Vernon before returning to Paris.
Round trip transportation to and from central Paris makes this day trip to these special gardens a breeze!

data.name: Montmartre and Sacre Coeur Walking Tour in Paris
data.description: Stroll through Paris' most bohemian neighborhood on a guided afternoon walk through Montmartre. You'll see where famous painters lived and worked in this beautiful hilltop part of Paris, with its windmills, cabarets and monuments. Begin your two-hour Paris Walking Tour of Montmartre just across the street from the most famous cabaret in the world - the Moulin Rouge. Then follow cobblestone streets to the highest point in Paris at the white Sacre Coeur Basilica, which offers breathtaking views in all directions.

data.name: Segway by night ! Illuminated Paris
data.description:
/!\ During the curfew, tour starts at 5:15PM and ends at 6:45PM.
Admire the illuminations of Parisian monuments and learn with our certified guides stories and anecdotes around the various monuments visited.

data.name: Sunset Versailles Bike Tour with Fireworks
data.description:
The Versailles at Sunset Bike Tour is a magical evening and the chance to see Versailles in the glow of sunset. For a limited number of Saturdays in the summer, the gardens will be brought to life with special effects, music, lighting, and a stunning fireworks display.

Your tour will begin in central Paris where your guide will help you board a train to Versailles where you'll grab picnic supplies (cost of supplies not included) as well as get fitted for your bikes. From here, you will enjoy a ride around the sprawling gardens of Versailles, exclusive after-hours access to the Chateau, as well as a picnic along the Grand Canal as the sun sets.

You'll get to see Versailles at its very best - at sunset, with limited people inside the palace, and with the magical fountain show. At the end of the evening, you'll be wowed by a spectacular fireworks display over the Grand Canal. This is the best way to experience Versailles and an evening you'll never forget.

data.name: Paris City Sightseeing Half Day Segway Guided Tour
data.description: Imagine cruising effortlessly through the parks and sidewalks of Paris while receiving a great orientation, informative historical and current-day information, heaps of unique and fascinating stories, great photo opportunities and superb personal service from your guide. Well dream no more and book your Paris City Segway Tour today!

data.name: Versailles and Giverny Small Group Tour from Paris
data.description: Explore the two of the most popular attractions outside Paris with convenient transportation from the city.  Discover the story and life of Versailles on a guided 1 hour and 15 minute guided visit of Versailles Palace in a group of no more than 30 people, then enjoy some free time in the gardens. Next, head to Giverny to visit Claude Monet's house and gardens in the afternoon. At the time of booking, you can upgrade to include lunch and drinks at a restaurant between the two visits. The tour includes round-trip transportation from your accommodation in Paris in a small group of up to 8 people.

data.name: Montmartre Hill Sweet & Savory French Gourmet Food & Wine Tasting Tour
data.description:
Is there anywhere in Paris a more emblematic and picturesque quarter than Montmartre ? How is it possible to concentrate so many French symbols and food in such a small area ? Follow your passionate local guide and unveil the mysteries of Montmartre during an unforgettable 3 hours food tour on top of the French capital !
• Between le Moulin Rouge and le Sacré Coeur, taste only the best of Montmartre!
• You’ll have 8 to 10 stops, both sweet and savory
• Small groups tours ensure you the best experience you can get!
• Chocolate, pastries, cheese, cured meats and wine on the menu…
• During the tour, you will have the opportunity to meet some of the most passionate and talented food artisans of the capital.

data.name: Paris Croissant Making Small-Group Class
data.description: Gain insight into the fine art of French "patisserie" on this 3-hour croissant-making class in Paris. Prepare your dough with guidance from your instructor and learn how to fold correctly for light, fluffy croissants. Bake fresh pain au chocolat to satisfy your sweet tooth and hear handy tips for great results every time. Then, take your pastry creations from the oven and savor them with a cup of tea or coffee. Enjoy personal attention from the instructor on this small-group tour, limited to eight people.

data.name: Paris 2-Hour Wine Tasting Session with Expert Sommelier
data.description: Discover France in six glasses and gain insight into the country’s famous wine regions on this 2-hour wine tasting in Paris. Learn about five of France’s primary winemaking regions and the wines for which they are famous. Gain insight into the links between flavor, grape and region, and hear how to recognize a wine’s origin without checking the label. Then, sample five wines and one type of Champagne during a blind tasting session. Enjoy personal attention from your guide, an expert sommelier, on this small-group tour, limited to 16 people.

data.name: Paris Sightseeing Guided Bike Tour Like a Parisian with a Local Guide
data.description: See Paris like a Parisian on a tour by bicycle! Whether it's your first or fifth time in Paris, this bike tour is the perfect way to travel from sight to sight at a leisurely pace. Getting around Paris by bicycle is the ideal orientation if you're new to Paris, and return visitors will discover new facts and hear new stories about the city they love. Either way, you are sure to agree that riding a bike is the best way to see Paris.

data.name: Olfactory Escape Workshop
data.description:
As a first walk in the world of perfume, this workshop will allow you to familiarize yourself with perfumery.
Smell, then choose your favorite fragrances among the 180 exclusive notes of our perfume organ, and take home your customized creation of 30 mL (1.014 fl oz).
The perfumer will be at your disposal to guide you and share his expertise

data.name: Excursion prolongée dans un vélo-bar à bière à Paris
data.description:
Un verre à la main et des pédales aux pieds!

Montez à bord du Beer Bike de Demi Tour Paris !
Avec 3 boissons incluses par personne,
Ce nouveau vélo insolite vous accueille pour une activité hors du commun.
Vous êtes dans un bar roulant pour 10 personnes, dont 6 pédaliers et 4 passagers !

Vous pédalez, discutez, rigolez et buvez pendant que vous profitez d'une vue imprenable de la capitale.
Notre équipe s'occupe du reste et est là pour vous faire passer un moment inoubliable !

Visitez donc Paris autrement, en passant par l'Arc de Triomphe, les Champs-Elysées, le Trocadéro, la tour Eiffel et les jardins de l'Avenue Foch.

Une activité originale, fun et green, à découvrir entre amis, en famille ou entre collègues.

data.name: Paris Local Market & Bastille District Food Tasting Tour
data.description:
Enjoy a Food Tour in one of the most authentic and intense areas of Paris far from the main tourist attractions!

Start the tour discovering the legendary Place de la Bastille, symbol of the french revolution, which is located in the 12th arrondissement, few minutes from the Seine river and the Marais district. You will enjoy there typical Parisian breakfast before heading to the Aligre Market through the innumerable (and almost secret) passages that make this district a trendy and creative place.

The Aligre market is one of the best known of Parisian foodies. He operate every morning (except on Mondays) and its stallholders welcome you right on the streets of the Aligre square. Its a fabulous mix between food sellers (inside and outside) and antique dealers, half of food market, half of a flea market.

Around this market, the diversity of shops related to the art of good cooking impresses gourmets from all around the world who are the most passionate about its diversity and richness.

data.name: Half-Day Private Tour in Paris with Guide
data.description: Explore Paris in style and in the company of an enthusiastic private Parisian guide on this 3-hour sightseeing tour. You'll see major landmarks such as the Eiffel Tower and Notre-Dame Cathedral, learn about the best places for shopping, and discover culinary delights.

data.name: Paris 2-Hour Wine and Cheese Pairing Small-Group Class
data.description: Sample regional French produce and learn the concept of "terroir" on this 2-hour wine and cheese pairing class in Paris. Taste four types of wine and one style of Champagne with your instructor, an experienced sommelier. Try five different types of cheese and gain insight into their characteristics. Hear the origins of the wine and cheese tasted during your class, and learn how to pair them for the best flavor combinations. Practice sabering a Champagne bottle and enjoy personal attention from your guide on this small-group tour, limited to 16 people.

data.name: Paris Macaron Making Small-Group Class with Advance Option
data.description: Master the art of making one of France’s most delicate pastries on this 3-hour macaron-making class in Paris. With step-by-step guidance from a helpful instructor, choose from a range of vibrant colors and create your elegant meringue shells. Whisk up the soft buttercream filling then carefully pipe it in. Relax as your macarons slowly bake in the oven, then taste them with a cup of tea or coffee. Enjoy personal attention from the instructor on this small-group tour, limited to eight people. Upgrade your booking for an advanced macarons class.

data.name: Tour en 2CV 3H Paris
data.description:
Discover Paris from the inside of our mythic and legendary citroën 2CV. Lean back and enjoy the ride while your private Parisian guide/driver shows you around his city. From the most famous and iconic landmarks to less known but intimate and charming areas of the capital.

French classic music will echo throughout your ears and fill the car creating and incredible ambience which will adapt accordingly to the district and history around you. Furthermore, we want to share our vision and passion for Paris.

Your chauffeur/Guide will pick you up directly from your hotel, apartment or any location inside the walls of Paris for that matter. Just let us know where you are.

At the end of the tour, we can as easily drop you off in one the floral gardens, perhaps a museum or why not indulge the numerous suggestions of your local guide ? The traditional French restaurant or the rooftop with a breathtaking view ? Maybe both !

We adapt Paris to you and together we create memories

data.name: TOUR en 2CV Paris Secret 2H
data.description:
Cette visite en 2CV de 2h est idéale pour découvrir la ville et découvrir les grands monuments parisiens mais aussi les quartiers insoupçonnés les lieux secrets y compris des parisiens eux memes.

Durant la visite, vous profitez des anecdotes de chauffeurs guides qui répondent à toutes vos attentes.

De très belles photos sont prises durant la visite pour immortaliser cet instant.

data.name: Paris Full-Day Small Group or Private Tour: Become a Parisian for a Day
data.description: A bit of glamour, a dose of history, a dash of quirk, and a lot of food—this total Paris tour is packed with everything you could ever need to see, do, and taste in order to be an honorary Parisian for the day. Start in the Paris fashion district, and walk with an insider guide past the Louvre and enjoy a macaroon tasting. See Centre Pompidou, sample some wine, enjoy cheese and pastries, and walk through the Marais. This tour is limited to 12 people to provide a small-group experience.

data.name: Flavors of Paris Original Tour
data.description:
Stroll through the neighborhood of Saint Germain and visit local shops, markets and restaurants sampling the finest in French fare, from the simplest crisp-crusted baguettes and velvety chocolates to exquisite olive oils, and other seasonal surprises. And not to mention memorable variations on the age-old theme of great wine and fabulous cheeses.

We’ll fascinate and delight you with what you’re tasting, as we share wonderful stories about the local cuisine and lively historical anecdotes about the quarter’s restaurants and cafés. (When you’re done, consider yourself a “Germanopratin”, or an honorary native of Saint-Germain.)

data.name: Une soirée au Diva's Kabaret in Paris
data.description:
Vivez une expérience parisienne classique en assistant à un spectacle de cabaret

Découvrez le cadre remarquable du Diva's Kabaret, une cave voutée du 12ème siècle, vestige des templiers.

Réservez des billets à l'avance pour garantir vos places et éviter toute déception

data.description:
Bikeloc est une agence de location scooter et moto.

data.name: Quiz Room Odéon
data.description: Quiz Room, c'est une activité unique au monde où vous pourrez buzzer comme à la télé mais avec votre groupe d'amis, votre famille ou votre entreprise. A l'immersion dans un décor de plateau TV s'ajoute une dimension fun : des manches et des jokers qui favorisent les interactions entre les participants et qui vous permettront, également grâce à des questions accessibles et amusantes, de passer un moment inoubliable !

data.name: Louvre museum with pickup
data.description:
Discover the most important Museum in the world with our licensed guide.

The Museum is a huge place. Our expert guide will optimise your visit in guiding you to the best places of interest. He will stay at your disposal to provide you with all explanations and make you discover all the major treasures of the Museum : its history, its architecture, its different arts periods.

data.name: Sainte Chapelle and Seine River Cruise Combo
data.description:
Be amazed with the magnificent 1113 stained glass windows with Saint Chapelle visit and be impressed with your boat tour by the rich historical buildings of Paris ; Eiffel Tower, Statu de la Liberte , Cite de la Mode, Hotel de Ville , Institut France, Musee d'Orsay ,Assemblee Nationale ,Notre-Dame de Paris, and the Conciergerie . Pass by charming houseboats and floating restaurants along the way. And the cruise & saint chapelle tickets can be used until the expiration date on it.
Please share with us your reachable e-mail address and phone number. Your tickets will send to your e-mail address or Whatsapp application, directly.

data.name: Yachts de Paris Seine River Gastronomic Dinner Cruise
data.description:
Explore the heart of Paris while enjoying a gastronomic 6-course dinner cruise on board the iconic Don Juan II yacht. An experience beyond time in an atmosphere of calm and luxury. Everything here exudes luxury "à la française".

Chef Guy Krenzer, twice elected "Meilleur Ouvrier de France" is pleased to invite you to discover his cuisine, composed of subtle gastronomic chords in perfect harmony with the wines and champagnes offered on board. Daring associations, a richness of flavors and delicate gustatory touches.

The decor, designed in an Art Deco spirit in collaboration with Pierre Frey, evokes the golden age of transatlantic ocean liners. Luxury, elegance and serenity are, more than ever, the essence of this legendary vessel.

data.name: Paris Bike Tour + Bike Rental (Dutch Bike)
data.description:
Paris tour and bike rental combo: the best way to see the city

Your day starts with our Highlights Tour. A friendly guide will show you the ins and outs of the city within 3 hours, so you will have a great overview of the city, its sights and its biking lanes. Cycle along the river Seine and experience the French atmosphere in a fun and authentic way. The tour ends around lunch time however, the bike fun continues! Thanks to our Paris Tour and Bike Rental combination deal you get to keep your bike until the end of the day and can explore the city further. This way you will not only save money but also time!

data.name: Secret Paris Tour on a dutch bike
data.description:
Have you been to Paris before and you have seen all the highlights ?

Then it’s time to take you to secret, non-touristy spots which you cannot miss.

We invite you to join us in a wonderful 3 hours bike tour on a real comfortable Dutch bike to discover the secrets of Paris !

Our English guide will take you to some of our personal favorite spots, away from the crowded tourist areas.

We will take you to romantic and hidden spots that remain underexposed in standard travel guides.

data.name: Paris By Night tour on a dutch bike
data.description:
The French capital is known as the City of Lights and during our Paris by Night bike tour, you will see why! We promise you that this tour will be an unforgettable experience. Cycle along the beautifully lit up monuments, the great avenues and see the best places of the city’s nightlife.

This Paris by Night bike tour is a perfect fit for you! In a group of up to 15 people, you will be cycling through historic neighborhoods and along the famous highlights. Halfway through you will have a quick break for a drink. Fall in love with the French capital while an English-speaking local is showing you this amazing city in a unique way.

data.name: Paris Bike Sightseeing Tour with Market Food-Tasting
data.description: Become a true Parisian and head for the places where the locals meet - the market.Discover the Paris that only a Parisian could know. From the Place de la Bastille to the Quai de la Seine, enjoy all the high-quality produce of the region: croissants, dried sausage, cheese, gratin dauphinois, coffee and much more .

data.name: Musée d'Orsay Impressionists Semi-Private Guided Tour
data.description: The gorgeous Musée d’Orsay is home to a stunning array of world-famous Impressionist masterpieces. Considered the favourite museum of both Parisians and visitors alike, this spectacular museum should not be missed!  Enjoy a 2 hour small group guided tour, with 6 people or fewer, and experience the museum in the best conditions possible.

data.name: Paris Luxury Bus Dining and Sightseeing Experience
data.description: On this unique panoramic bus tour, dine in true Parisian style while admiring top Paris attractions including the Eiffel Tower, the Louvre Museum, Notre Dame Cathedral and the Champs-Elysées. Board a glass-enclosed, double-decker bus, take a seat at your table and take in beautiful views of Paris from every angle as you dine on fine French cuisine. A 2.5-hour 6-course dinner tour.

data.name: Le Louvre Museum Private Tour for Families
data.description: Join a family tour specialist on a historical exploration of the world’s most famous museum with skip the line access in a private tour adapted to the whole family. As well as meeting the Louvre’s most famous residents including Mona Lisa, Venus de Milo and the Winged Victory of Samothrace, your  private guide will tailor the tour to your family’s interests. Designed as an adventure for all ages, the experience will focus on observing and learning about the magic of a former royal residence, and bringing to life its Masterpieces through enchanting anecdotes and stories. Activity sheets for children are included as the perfect souvenir of their visit!

data.name: Paris Seine River Gourmet Dinner Cruise
data.description:
Enjoy a cruise along the River Seine in Paris while having dinner aboard La Marina de Paris glass-enclosed boat. Take in the stunning sights during a sophisticated gourmet meal including coffee or tea.
Cruise past notorious monuments and magnificent bridges. Capture the sparkling Eiffel Tower and the beauty of magical Paris from a different perspective.Departure is directly from Port Solferino on Quai Anatole France facing the Orsay Museum.

A spectacular gastronomic experience awaits you, courtesy of our Chef and his crew. The menu consists of a chioce of starters, main course and a variety of delicious desserts.

A la carte drinks are available to purchase onboard among a wide selection of cocktails, wines, beers, and soft drinks.

Coffee or Tea included

data.name: Courte visite en vélo avec de la bière à Paris
data.description:
2 boissons par personne

Montez à bord du Beer Bike, une osmose entre un bar roulant et le vélo festif ultime.

Imaginez !
Vous vous baladez dans les plus belles rues parisiennes au pied des plus grands monuments avec l'Arc de Triomphe et les Champs Elysées notamment avec un verre à la main et des pédales aux pieds !

Visitez Paris sous un nouvel angle de façon ludique et original en famille ou entre amis.

data.name: Versailles Small-Group Guided Tour from Paris
data.description: Go back in time to experience the opulence of the Palace and Gardens of Versailles on this small-group guided tour from Paris. Walk through the glittering Hall of Mirrors and see the Royal Apartments. Admire the enormous gardens and beautiful fountain displays. Famous foutain shows are included when operating.

data.name: Chateaux de Fontainebleau, Vaux le Vicomte Day Tour from Paris
data.description: See two magnificent French castles – Vaux le Vicomte and Château Fontainebleau – on a day trip from Paris! Audio-guided tours at each site are included, so you’ll learn about the castles’ history and art, as well as the eccentric royals who once called the places home. Enjoy free time to explore the castles’ gardens, seeing the grandiose fountains, lakes and monuments that characterized palace grounds during the Renaissance and Baroque eras.

data.name: 2 hour outdoor group activity in Paris: SAINT GERMAIN
data.description: Foxtrail is unique. During the activity you will encounter permanent installations that the fox has hidden around the city. They combine creativity with technology, producing fun and original challenges. Clues will require both intelligence and teamwork to solve, similar to an Escape Room. However you are free to complete the trail at your own pace, so you can fully appreciate the sights and unexplored corners of the city you will discover along the way.

data.name: Paris by Night Illuminations Tour and Moulin Rouge Show
data.description: Paris is fabulous by day but unforgettable by night. Don't miss the chance to take an after-dinner Paris by Night Illuminations Tour and visit the home of the Cancan, the famous Moulin Rouge. You'll tour all the illuminated Paris sights, monuments and squares en route to Montmartre and the Moulin Rouge cabaret.

data.name: Belleville Gallery Walk - Private Tour
data.description:
Belleville is a lively, creative district which lies at the crossroads of the 10th, 11th, 19th and 20th arrondissements in the North East of Paris. Packed full of artists, artisans, and galleries that have transformed this neighbourhood. Your visit through Belleville with an art insider will give you an introduction to the up and coming galleries, the artists that have brought this neighbourhood to life and the studios they work in.

We will also explore the history of the neighbourhood, and wander through the street among the many cafés, bars and restaurants in this vibrant part of Paris.

data.name: Paris to Giverny with Admission Ticket and Transport
data.description: Enjoy a private morning or afternoon tour from Paris to visit Claude Monet’s beautiful house and garden in the French town of Giverny. Spend 3-hours in Giverny, plenty of time to visit. It is always a treat as colors in the gardens change depending on the season. Whether in full bloom or in autumn, it will always be beautiful to discover.

data.name: America's Founding Fathers in Paris, Walk in their Footsteps (Small Group Tour)
data.description:
Without France, the American Revolution would not have succeeded.

Without America, the French Revolution might not have happened.

America & France are two nations united by a shared history, a history that is older than America itself. Our Founding Fathers sought the help of France to create our nation, and this tour will take you to the places where these great patriots lived & worked.

Along the way we will discuss the contribution that France made in ensuring American victory against the British – and the contribution that America made in disseminating Revolutionary ideals among the French elite.

The Franco-American friendship has now lasted 230 years, and throughout that time Americans have continued coming to Paris.

data.name: Paris Grevin Wax Museum Ticket
data.description: The Grevin Wax Museum invites you to experience the spirit of Paris of yesterday and of today, through astounding scenes and more than 200 wax figures.

data.name: Family Treasure Hunt around Notre-Dame Cathedral
data.description:
Imagine a kid is asked about what he/she wants to be when they grow up. Have you noticed that being an archeologist happens to be at the top of the list? Well, thank you Indiana Jones!

Feeling the way a treasure hunter feels is a wish this family tour around Notre-Dame will fulfill. Provided with an activity booklet, your children will be helped by a certified art historian to unveil the secrets of the Sainte Chapelle and to explore Ile de la Cité medieval side streets around Notre-Dame. Both informed and entertained, your kids will remain engaged throughout this 2-hour tour and have to use their best skills of observation. Like archaeologists' apprentices, they’ll discover clues along their way to solve a final puzzle.

Everybody have his/her magnifying glass at the ready? Okay, let’s go on the trail of mystery!

data.name: Mundolingua Museum Admission Ticket
data.description:
Welcome to Mundolingua the Museum of Languages

Everywhere, even in our dreams, language plays a vital role in our lives. Our world of language, languages and linguistics, MUNDOLINGUA, invites you to discover its secrets via documentsand recordings on touchscreens, a variety of objects and games. 

Omniprésent jusqu'à l'intimité de nos rêves, le langage joue un rôle déterminant dans la vie. Notre monde du langage, des langues et de la linguistique MUNDOLINGUA vous invite à découvrir ses secrets à travers des lectures et des écoutes depuis les écrans tactiles, une variété d'objets et des jeux. UN MUSEE POUR S'AMUSER

data.name: Eiffel Tower Morning Guided Visit with Parisian Breakfast
data.description: Enjoy discovering the world’s most visited paid-access monument in a unique setting, where for once you won’t be submerged by its many, many visitors! Start your day off on the right foot with this early-morning experience, where you’ll get to enjoy a complimentary coffee and croissant in a typical french brasserie at the bottom of Eiffel Tower, before hopping on an entertaining and informative Eiffel Tower tour, lead by your expert, passionate guide. Summit access is optional, but our lovely hand-made maps of Paris are complimentary!

data.name: Louvre & Tuileries Walking Tour with Skip The Line Ticket Option
data.description:
Enjoy a visit of the famous Tuileries gardens and optional skip-the-line access to the Louvre, and discover the world’s most visited museum! Make the best out of your time in Paris with a one-hour commented walk lead by your friendly, professional guide, who’ll be more than happy to share plenty of fascinating and often unknown facts and anecdotes about the Louvre and its surroundings.

Learn about the Tuileries as you walk through these gorgeous - and not too crowded - gardens, take in the stunning view offered by the “Axe Historique” (from the Arc du Carrousel to the Arc de Triomphe), and learn all there is to know about the Louvre and its exceptional History before entering the museum (optional), for a relaxed self-guided experience!

data.name: Nice Hard Rock Cafe Skip-the-Line Admission Including Meal
data.description: Skip the waiting list and enjoy priority seating at the all-new Hard Rock Cafe Nice, France’s second Hard Rock Cafe location after Paris. Enjoy a 2-course or 3-course meal complete with classical American food, drinks and music. Browse the retail store after your meal to purchase souvenirs and see historic rock memorabilia.

data.name: Seine River Cruise on board Vedettes du Pont Neuf
data.description: Discover Paris in a different way: Embark for a Seine Cruise onboard the famous Vedettes du Pont Neuf! From the Louvre Museum to the  Notre-Dame Cathedral, passing by the Eiffel Tower, discover the most beautiful monuments in Paris the time of a cruise along the Seine. The cruise departs from Paris’ oldest bridge, the Pont-Neuf, lasts an hour and is commented by our guides in French and English. During the day or at night, feel free to make your cruise at any time according to your wishes and program.

data.name: Louvre Museum Skip the Line Access Private Guided Visit
data.description: Discover the world's most famous museum on a skip-the-line private tour of the Louvre Museum in Paris. This is one of those sites that seldom need introductions – its fame precedes it, and we will show you why. With our guided visit, you are sure not only to skip the long waiting like but also that you won't miss any of the key works of art.

data.name: Private Dark Chocolate Tasting Tour in Paris
data.description: Treat yourself to a two hour introduction to the world of fine dark chocolate bars. You will learn not only on the chocolate history, but also how to recognize, appreciate and enjoy a fine dark chocolate bar.

data.name: Pompidou Museum Paris 2-Hour Private Guided Tour
data.description: Discover the world’s largest collection of contemporary art on a 2-hour tour of the Pompidou Centre in central Paris. Skip the long lines to navigate the diverse styles and expressions of artists such as Pollock, Picasso, Dix, Duchamp, and more.

data.name: Pere Lachaise Cemetery Guided Walking Tour - Private Tour
data.description: Prepare for a truly surprising discovery on our 2.5 hour private guided walking tour through the Père Lachaise Cemetery, home to famous Paris residents like Jim Morison. This walking tour will explore the famous graves of this eastern Paris landmark. Good walking shoes are recommended.

data.name: Skip-the-line & Private Guided Tour: Louvre Museum
data.description: Beat the entrance lines to one of France’s top attractions and explore with ease on this 2.5 hour skip-the-line guided Louvre Museum tour in Paris. The Louvre Museum is very popular among Paris’ locals and visitors alike, and queues can be long. Follow a private guide through the hallowed hallways and gain insight into thousands of years of art history. Discover famous works such as the ‘Mona Lisa’ or the ‘Venus de Milo’, and enjoy free time to explore further at the end of this guided tour.

data.name: Skip-the-line Centre Pompidou Guided Museum Tour - Private Tour
data.description: On this 2.5 hour private guided museum tour, your guide will lead you to explore Renzo Piano’s colorful yet confusing landmark and the art within. Explore Paris’s best collection of modern and contemporary art while visiting the whimsical Pompidou Center.

data.name: Skip-the-line & Private Guided Tour: Orangerie Museum
data.description: On this 2 hour private guide museum tour, your expert guide will lead you through history to explain why this unique, yet overlooked collection is one of the best in Paris. A former home for royal orange trees, the Orangerie today houses artwork by some of France’s most notable names.

data.name: Paris to Versailles Round-Trip Coach Transfer
data.description: Enjoy convenient, easy and budget-friendly transport from Paris to Versailles with this round-trip coach transfer service. Skip the hassle of train schedules or expensive taxis and instead enjoy comfortable transport by air-conditioned coach, with a morning or afternoon departure. Let your driver do the work as you relax on the 45-minute drive to world-famous Versailles, where you’ll have about four hours to explore independently before your return trip to Paris.

data.name: Skip-the-line & Semi-Private Guided Tour: Louvre Museum
data.description: This 2.5 hour semi-private (8 Guest Maximum) guided tour of the Louvre museum allows you to skip the line and head directly into its galleries with our knowledgeable guides. This tour includes a visit to some of the most iconic pieces while also exploring the history behind the building that, today, is larger than the palace at Versailles. We’ll give you a ticket valid all day so you can return, and you even have the option to book an evening tour on Wednesday or Friday with us to avoid the crowds if possible.

data.name: Paris Moulin Rouge Cabaret Show & Dinner with Choice Menus including Christmas
data.description: Enjoy an evening dinner show at the Moulin Rouge the number one show in Paris. With a choice of three different dinner menus, don't miss your chance to see the world-renowned showgirls and French Cancan dancers strut their stuff on the Moulin Rouge's historic stage. Moulin Rouge Paris sells out months in advance, so book ahead to avoid disappointment.

data.name: Lido de Paris "Paris Merveilles" 3-Course Dinner and Show
data.description:
Enjoy an evening of glitzy, glamorous cabaret and a delicious 3-course dinner at Paris’ brand new Lido de Paris "Paris Merveilles" show. Head to the city’s famous Avenue des Champs-Elysées and discover a world of decadent dancers, sparkling sequins, extraordinary sets, magical lighting and captivating music. With the delectable Bluebell girls on stage and talented chefs producing delicious dishes in the kitchen, take in the sights and sounds of one of Paris’ newest and most impressive cabaret performances. Dreamlike and tantalizing, the show's sets offer a tour de force of imagination and excitement!

Lido de Paris is free for children under 11*
*Not applicable for special nights like Christmas and New Year's Eve. For Soirees Etoile, Champs Elysees, and Triomphe, beverages are not included in children menu.

data.name: Paris Seine River Dinner Cruise with Glass of Champagne and Photo Souvenir
data.description:
A magical and unforgettable experience in the City of Light !
Embark for a memorable romantic journey.
Enjoy the cruise on the Seine and let yourself be carried by the magic of Paris at night while tasting a wonderful champagne. And to crown it all... The show of the twinkling Eiffel Tower waits for you at the end of the cruise, a souvenir photo will be offered to you to immortalize this unique moment.
A loving breakaway through the City of Light.

Menu: You will enjoy a choice of starters, main course and dessert.

An unforgettable moment for lovers in the City of Love.

White, red, rosé, sparkling and sweet wines, you’ll be amazed by the diversity of Loire Valley wines! This private tour includes round-trip transportation by air-conditioned black car or minivan.

data.name: Paris 3-Hour Literary Greats Walking Tour from 18th Century on
data.description: Enjoy a 3-hour literary tour in Paris and mingle with the ghosts of Fitzgerald, Balzac, Sartre, and many others as you unlock the stories of the legendary Parisian writing scene. Hear interesting facts and anecdotes like why Hemingway called Paris a “moveable feast” or about an eccentric poet who walked his pet lobster around on a leash. See where Oscar Wilde drew his last breath, and visit the location of the original Shakespeare and Company bookstore. This small-group tour is limited to 10 people, or you can upgrade to a private tour when booking.

data.name: Champagne Masterclass & gourmet tour in Paris
data.description:
Do you want to participate in a sparkling discovery of Paris? Are you looking for an authentic and unforgettable experience?

Enjoy an exclusive and unique Champagne tour in the historical neighborhood of Saint Germain. During a 3 hour walking tour you will experience the French “art de vivre”, gastronomy and most of all, Champagne! Your English speaking and wine expert guide will make you discover Paris off the beaten track. You will be headed through many stops where you will meet authentic French artisans and foodies who will share with you their culture and passion. At the end of the tour, you will indulge french delicacies paired with Champagnes in a private cellar of the neighborhood. In order to make you become an expert, you will taste five specific Champagnes during this tour.

Cheers!

data.name: Paris Small-Group Cheese and Wine-Tasting Experience
data.description: Cheese and wine, the perfect marriage. Master the art of pairing these two delicacies during a tasting session in an underground cheese cellar in Paris. With your guide, a professional cheesemonger, delve below Paris' busy streets to discover an underground treasure trove of maturing cheeses. Sit down to enjoy a variety of seven French and Swiss cheeses, and learn how to match them with different wines while nibbling on French bread and fruit. Numbers are limited to 10 during this small-group tasting session, ensuring a more intimate experience.

data.name: Normandy Small Group Food Tour from Paris
data.description:
This small group tour from Paris will let you discover the best of Normandy during a whole day.

Escape from Paris for the day and join our wine & spirits expert driver & guide in our comfortable minivan!

Enjoy delicious local cheeses (Camembert, Livarot, Coulommiers, Pont-L’Eveque) during a visit at a cheese factory, as well as apple cider & Calvados (hard cider) during your lunch at a traditionnal distillery.

You will also discover the beautiful landscapes of the Côte Fleurie (flowery coast) that inspired many impressionist painters and two emblematic cities of the region, the glamourous Deauville and the romantic Honfleur.

data.name: Loire Castles Guided Tour from Paris
data.description:
Take a 1-day guided tour from Paris to discover the three more prestigious castles of the Loire Valley: Chenonceau, built on the Cher River, Cheverny, private castle and Chambord, jewel of the Renaissance.

CHENONCEAU CASTLE:

Model of the Renaissance traditions, the Chenonceau Castle is an architectural masterpiece. Known as the "Château des Dames", five women played a part to the interior decoration, making Chenonceau one of the most romantic castle in the Loire valley.

CHAMBORD CASTLE:

Considered as the largest and most majestic castle of the Loire valley, Chambord Castle was commissioned as a hunting lodge by François I. The main attraction remains the intricate "double revolution" staircase attributed to Leonardo de Vinci.

CHEVERNY CASTLE:

The Cheverny Castle is the private property of the Vibraye family. During the visit, you could admire its wonderful 17th century furniture.

data.name: Bruges Guided Day Tour from Paris
data.description:
Discover Bruges, a famous medieval city, also called "the little Venice of the North". During the tour, you will enjoy the city's grace and beauty. You will be surprised by the region of the Flanders with its specific architecture, colourful charm, art of living and its hundred year old traditions. Classified as part of UNESCO Heritage, the city of Bruges is well-known as "the little Venice of the North " because of its numerous canals which cross the city.

During your pedestrian tour, you will discover "le Beffroi, la Grand'Place, la Basilique Saint-Sang , le Béguinage, ... " Another way to enjoy the charm of the city is one hour cruise on its famous canals. During the winter, the cruise is replaced by a visit of the gothic style town hall. At last, you will have free time to stroll through the colourful lanes and places of interest and you will look for typical specialities from Bruges such as chocolates...

data.name: Eiffel Tower Access with Seine River Dinner Cruise and Moulin Rouge Show
data.description: Experience the magical decadence of Paris! In one truly unforgettable night, you’ll enjoy a Dinner Cruise along the Seine taking in the spectacular monuments, a priority entry trip up the iconic Eiffel Tower to gaze upon the sparkling City of Lights. Complete your evening at the famous and flamboyant Moulin Rouge - French Cancan and champagne included. Glass of champagne or half bottle upon the option you choose.

data.name: Paris City Ghost & Mystery Night Walking Tour
data.description: For a twist on the usual sightseeing experience, take a 3-hour after-dark tour of Paris to admire its illuminated landmarks and monuments while listening to stories about the city deepest darkest secrets. Hear chilling tales of murder, mystery, mayhem and ghosts in the winding alleys and squares of Ile de la Cite and its surroundings.

data.name: Eiffel Tower 3-Course Dinner and Seine River Cruise
data.description: Step out and experience the City of Lights at night. When darkness falls, Paris puts on a show with its river and monuments lit up to advantage. Dressed to the nines, you’ll dine at the Eiffel Tower with an amazing romantic view. After your gourmet three-course French-Style meal, step aboard a glass-topped vessel to begin your cruise along the river Seine, marveling at how different, and even more beautiful, the city appears after sundown.

data.name: Monet Gardens Small Group Tour From Paris
data.description: Visit the beautiful home and garden that inspired the master of Impressionism, Claude Monet, on a small group half-day tour from Paris. The half-day tour is guided, also you'll have free time to explore at your own pace. Takes in Monet's restored home and garden in Giverny, and you'll also visit the Musée des Impressionnismes. Maximum of only 15 passengers on this small-group tour from Paris.

data.name: Skip-the-Line Giverny and Monet House from Paris
data.description: Like nature? Love Impressionism? Read on! Let us whisk you away on a half-day trip to the village of Giverny where Monet and other Impressionists set up home in the 19th Century. After a short one-and-a-half-hour ride from Paris, you’ll find yourself in this quaint little village in Normandy, where you’ll visit Monet’s exquisite house and gardens. Your art historian guide will animate your tour around the flowerbeds that proved a source of inspiration for Monet, past the water lily pond made famous in the Nymphéas series and across the Japanese bridge that pops up so often in his work. Then you’ll explore Monet’s house, almost untouched by the passage of time.

data.description:
Discover the pure beauty of Bruges in a day. From monasteries to cathedrals and palaces, you’ll be guided though the city center (if guided option) that well deserves its UNESCO world heritage title. Admire the splendor of original medieval architecture and enjoy the fascinating story of its history. Take in the incredible sites of the Venice of the North cruising along its romantic canals and take time out to leisurely lunch and shop.

The city’s romantic charm and stunning architecture make this a perfect day to remember.

data.name: Paris Moulin Rouge Dinner Show with Transport
data.description: Experience the heady nightlife of Paris with a three-course dinner and show at the Paris Moulin Rouge, home of the French Cancan in bohemian Montmartre. Wine and dine while watching the Moulin Rouge's brilliant new show, "Feerie", the essence of Parisian cabaret. While at the Moulin Rouge you'll enjoy fine traditional French food such as foie gras, pate or fine seafood. Your tour includes transportation to Moulin Rouge by air-conditioned coach from a central Paris location.

data.name: Seine River Cruise with French Dinner on Champs-Elysees Avenue
data.description:
Enjoy the most pleasant and easiest way to discover the city of lights on a one hour Seine River cruise.

Embark on a boat trip down the Seine River. Unwind while contemplating the history of Paris and admire its many monuments such as the Orsay Museum, Notre Dame Cathedral and the many bridges with their unique architecture.

In the evening enjoy your typical French meal in the famous l'Alsace Restaurant on Champs-Elysees Avenue.

data.name: Paris Illuminations Sightseeing by Night Tour
data.description: There's nothing quite like Paris at night! On this illuminations tour, you'll watch Paris transform into the City of Lights as you ride past the Eiffel Tower, Notre Dame, the Louvre, the Champs-Elysées, l’Arc de Triomphe, Hôtel de Ville, Les Invalides, Place de la Concorde, Place Vendôme, Opéra and more. Learn about Paris' rich history along the way. Choose a standard coach tour or small-group minivan tour for a more personalized experience.

data.name: Conciergerie Entrance Ticket & Seine River Cruise
data.description:
During your visit to the Conciergerie, explore the ancient court of the French Revolution. In this picturesque site, admire the cells of the criminals and the tombs of the heroes of the French Revolution. Get more information about the transformation of the Conciergerie during its history, from the royal palace to the justice of the French monarch and the revolutionary court. See the cell where Marie Antoinette was imprisoned, among other famous prisoners during this period.
Your package also includes a 1-hour cruise on the Seine River, which you can take at any time during your stay. Be impressed with your boat tour by the rich historical buildings of Paris ; Eiffel Tower, Statu de la Liberte , Cite de la Mode, Hotel de Ville , Institut France, Musee d'Orsay ,Assemblee Nationale ,Notre-Dame de Paris, and the Conciergerie .
Please share with us your reachable e-mail address and phone number. Your tickets will send to your e-mail address or Whatsapp application, directly.

data.description:
Enjoy the most pleasant and easiest way to discover the city of lights on a one hour Seine River cruise.

Unwind while contemplating many monuments such as the Louvre Museum and Notre Dame Cathedral.
