data.name: Unique Fashion Workshop / Denim Jacket
data.description:
You will transform a denim jacket, an American classic, into a unique fashion statement, with French Chic! Everyone knows that denim jackets last forever.

We have created a workshop to create YOUR own timeless piece of French fashion. After taking your measurement, you will imagine, select and compose the different ornaments (fabrics, embroidery, patches ...) to create your unique jacket
We will guide you for 3 hours. First, we'll tell you the story of this iconic fashion item first introduced in 1880 and then popularized by Marilyn Monroe. Then you will head to the workshop. Our team of designers will assemble all the textile parts.
Finally, accessorize it, with the help of our embroiderer !! and paint your jacket directly to make sure it matches your style and mood.

data.name: Marais District 2-Hour Private Walking Tour in Paris
data.description:
Take a 2-hour walking tour in Paris with a private guide to gain insight into the history and culture of the Marais district, a trendy neighborhood with a rich past and plenty of great architecture to admire.

Templars, great kings, famous writers and rock stars have been the inhabitants of the most chic district of Paris: the Marais. Superb palaces, art galleries, trendy boutiques, bistros and elegant tearooms, but crossing the Marais means also diving into the great historical and artistic heritage of France.

The horrors of the Holocaust in the Museum of Judaism, the Europe's largest contemporary art collection in the Pompidou Center by Renzo Piano, the great palaces that now house the National Archive and museums. A neighborhood full of contradictions where you can meet on the same sidewalk the beefy bouncer of a gay club and a rabbi who calls to prayer.

We will pass under the elegant arcades of Place de Vosges and conclude our journey where the French Revolution began: the Bastille!

data.name: Private 2-Hour Guided Tour in Orsay Museum Paris
data.description: Enjoy this 2-hour private guided tour of Orsay Museum with the special focus on museum´s history and architecture and the 19th century art.

data.name: Day Trip to Provence and Avignon by Train
data.description: Visit Avignon and experience the magnificent beauty of Provence on a full-day trip from Paris by TGV, France’s high-speed train. Enjoy the scenic landscapes surrounding the town of Avignon and visit the Popes' Palace, one of the biggest Gothic palaces in Europe. See the Roman ruins in St Rémy de Provence, enjoy a tour with your expert local guide around the picturesque village of Les Baux de Provence and visit the Pont du Gard, a famous Roman bridge.

data.name: Loire Valley Castles Audio Guided Tour
data.description: Explore the Loire Valley Castles with a self-guided audio tour or at your Leisure ( if option selected) that includes a transfer from central Paris. Enjoy access to Chenonceau, and Grandiose Chambord and enjoy a comprehensive experience of these Loire Valley treasures.

data.name: Paris to Mont Saint-Michel Full-Day Tour with Lunch and Entry
data.description: Expand your horizons with a day trip to medieval Mont St Michel, one of France’s most iconic attractions. This magical UNESCO World Heritage island is a step out of the ordinary with its famous Gothic abbey and legendary stories. You’ll arrive after a scenic drive from Paris through the landscapes of Normandy, with a guide to brush up on your history. There’ll be plenty of time to explore the island, admire the bay views and do a little shopping. You'll have free time for lunch at Mont Saint Michel.

data.name: Versailles Audio-Guided Independent Tour, Skip-the-Line Entry
data.description: Discover Versailles on this 9-hour audio guided tour going at your own pace visiting the royal palace of Louis XIV and the gardens. Take a leisurely stroll to explore the gardens and see the fountains on your way to the Grand Trianon. Visit the palace to see the Hall of Mirrors, chapels, and apartments to name a few. Also, have a look around the Magnificent City of Versailles beyond the palace’s walls.

data.name: Normandy, St-Malo, Mont St-Michel, and Loire Valley from Paris
data.description: Visit three different corners of France and discover some of the country’s most beautiful landmarks on this 3-day tour of Normandy, Saint-Malo, Mont Saint-Michel and the Loire Valley. Explore Rouen’s ancient Old Town and the delightful coastal town of Honfleur. Visit Omaha Beach and learn of the World War II Normandy landings. Visit Saint-Malo and the UNESCO World Heritage site of Mont Saint-Michel with your guide. Tour fine medieval châteaux in the Loire Valley, including the famous Château de Langeais. Accommodation in 4-star hotels and some meals included.

data.name: Literary Paris: Private Book Lovers' Tour
data.description: Enjoy a 3-hour literary tour in Paris and mingle with the ghosts of Fitzgerald, Balzac, Sartre, and many others as you unlock the stories of the legendary Parisian writing scene. Hear interesting facts and anecdotes like why Hemingway called Paris a “moveable feast” or about an eccentric poet who walked his pet lobster around on a leash. See where Oscar Wilde drew his last breath, and visit the location of the original Shakespeare and Company bookstore.

data.name: Wartime Paris: Private WWII History Tour
data.description: Relive the most harrowing and heroic moments of WWII during a 3-hour guided private walking tour of Paris under the Nazi Occupation. Explore the former urban battlefields where the dramas of war played out. See the bullet holes and tank impacts that still scar the landscape of Paris. Learn stories of the French Resistance and the brave everyday men and women who rose up to take their city back. Hear of how Hitler ordered Paris to be destroyed, and how the city narrowly escaped certain annihilation. The maximum group size for this tour is 10 people.

data.name: Escape game Ghost
data.description: L'Antichambre vous propose les meilleurs escape games d'Europe en plein cœur de Paris. Une aventure passionnante et bien réelle à vivre entre amis, en famille ou avec vos collègues. Nos maîtres du jeux sont formés pour vous faire vivre un moment sympathique, ludique et magique pour que ce soit vous les stars de votre escape game !

data.name: Immersive Coach Tour with Histopad and Lunch Cruise
data.description: The Must See Paris tour to explore the City and admire some of the most beautiful and iconic Monuments ,bridges and avenues.You will depart from our central located agency at 10am by Motorcoach. The tour will include a sighseeing tour with our exclusive Histopad : an immersive tablet with 3D animation and commentary for the whole family, and a 3 course French gastronomic meal on the River Seine with Bateaux Parisians in a warm and musical atmosphere.A great experience to discover during 2 hours the beauty of the City and some amazing and spectacular monuments along the River Seine through an all-glass boat.The return back will be at the foot of the Iconic Tower. You could then continue exploring the city at your own pace.

data.name: Versailles Palace Private Day Tour From Paris with Lunch
data.description: All Day Intimate tour from Paris to Versailles. By Private minibus, your guide will relate all about  Louis XIV's Kingdom, The Royal Appartments, The Halll of Mirrors, the Small and largeTrianon, the Gardens. The tour will include lunch near the Grand Canal as well as  a pick up and drop off from your hotel in Paris.

data.name: Normandy D-Day Landing Beaches with Private Guide From Paris
data.description: Intimate Guided Normandy day trip from Paris by air conditioned minibus. You will  discover the D-Day beaches of World War II with your private guide.The Omaha Beach and its visitor center to learn stories and historical facts about the events in Normandy; a walk through the American Cemetery dedicated to honor the fallen heroes of the U.S; and stop by the Airborn Museum. Free time for lunch after the Museum visit at Sainte Mère Eglise. Return back in Paris at the end of the day for a drop to your hotel.

data.name: Paris City and Seine River Sightseeing Bike Tour
data.description: Head off on your 3-hour guided bike tour from the right bank of the Seine River. Ride pass many of the city's popular landmarks; making frequent stops to take pictures. Your ride will be enriched as your professional guide provides you with interesting facts and entertaining anecdotes. All necessary equipment is included in this tour.

data.name: Paris Seine River Lunch Cruise with 3-Course Gourmet Meal
data.description:
Embark on board of our boat PARIS SEINE for a lunch cruise along the Seine River.

The menu consists of a variety of tasty starters, the choice of a main course and a ¨Café Gourmand¨ (coffee served with a selection of delicious delights).

Sure to be one of the highlights of your stay in Paris, this Seine River lunch is the most relaxing way to see famous attractions like the Eiffel Tower, Notre Dame, the Louvre, and Pont Neuf. Sit back, relax and admire Paris' beautiful waterfront sights as you savor a gourmet meal. Enjoy amazing views, fabulous service, and exquisite cuisine aboard your glass-enclosed Paris Seine La Marina boat.

Choose the romantic option for a meal with a glass of champagne and mini tablet of organic chocolate "Le chocolat des Francais" included.

Drinks are to be purchased on the spot

Children and Vegetarian options available on board
Complimentary coffee or tea is included at the end of your meal. A la carte drinks are available to purchase onboard

data.name: Eiffel Tower Summit Access Audio Guided Visit with Optional Seine River Cruise
data.description:
Let yourself be carried away by the voice of your interactive guide and discover the Parisian Iron Lady!
As soon as you ascend, soak up the beauty of this historic monument, a true architectural wonder. Originally built for the 1889 Universal Exhibition
by Gustave Eiffel, the Iron Lady is now the symbol of France in the world and welcomes more than 7 million visitors per year!
On the third floor, enjoy an exceptional panoramic view of all of Paris and discover the fascinating history of the Tower as well as that of famous
Parisian monuments such as the Arc de Triomphe, the Louvre and the Sacré-Coeur.
Don't forget to stop at the first floor to admire the spectacular glass floor located 57 meters above the ground and experience the sensation of
having your feet in the air!
Finally, board a relaxing guided cruise on the Seine River and contemplate the most beautiful bridges of the city... The meeting time will be at least 15 minutes prior to the departure nearby the Emblematic Monument.

data.name: Private Tour Versailles with Guid
data.description:
Chateau de Versailles Transport Aller Retour + Visite Guidée
Découverte du plus beau joyaux d'Europe, le mythique Chateau de Versailles. Découvrez les appartements du Roi Louis XIV, la galerie des glaces, son jardin somptueux.
Cette visite au départ de Paris avec transport aller retour et incluant un guide du chateau vous permet de vous plonger au coeur de l'histoire

data.name: Laser Game VR - TOYLAND: CRAZY MONKEY
data.description:
Le Laser Game VR se vit en équipe dans un espace de 100m2.
Ultime aventure du jeu en VR (sol vibrant, sièges dynamiques), avec le Laser Game VR la frontière entre le réel et le virtuel disparaît complètement.

data.name: Marais District Sightseeing Bike Tour in Paris
data.description: Get ready to cycle from Central Paris, near Centre Pompidou and to have a great experience! The friendly team will provide you with a great quality bike , helmet and waterproof Poncho should the weather take a turn for the worse. Then its off on a leisurely 3 hour tour taking in the following monuments and places of interest

data.name: Tour à pied avec guide privée quartier latin + patisserie offerte 2H
data.description: L'histoire n’aura plus de secret pour vous après cette visite à pied avec Parisitour. En petit groupe et en compagnie de nos guides conférenciers et véritable experts de la ville de Paris, les conditions sont idéales sont réunies pour apprendre les secrets, anecdotes et surprise de la capitale. Avec une histoire de plus de 2 000 ans, Paris a vécu et survécu le temps. La capitale du pays le plus visité au monde vous attend donc pour une ballade à pied, avec un regard appuyé sur cette ville qui fait tant rêver.

data.name: Visite De Montmartre à Pied et Degustation De Vin
data.description:
Cette visite a été pensé par un montmartrois qui vit sur la place du Tertre et véritable amoureux de ce village parisien décide de la faire vivre pour tous

En 2 heures vous allez découvrir les lieux célèbres mais aussi cachés de Montmartre des commentaires des arrêts avec photos sont prévus pour que vous profitiez pleinement de l'expérience Cette visite de Montmartre est unique Vous terminez cette visite par une dégustation de vins 3 au choix dans un lieu mythique à Montmartre

data.name: Bruges Small Group Guided Day Tour from Paris
data.description:
Discover the pure beauty of Bruges in a day. From monasteries to cathedrals and palaces, you’ll be guided though the city center that well deserves its UNESCO world heritage title. Admire the splendor of original medieval architecture and enjoy the fascinating story of its history. Take in the incredible sites of the Venice of the North cruising along its romantic canals and take time out to leisurely lunch and shop.

The city’s romantic charm and stunning architecture make this a perfect day to remember.

data.name: Eiffel Tower Experience with Dinner at the 1st Floor and Seine River Cruise
data.description: Step out and experience the City of Lights at night. When darkness falls, Paris puts on a show with its river and monuments lit up to advantage. Dressed to the nines, you’ll dine at the Eiffel Tower with an amazing romantic view. After your gourmet three-course French-Style meal, step aboard a glass-topped vessel to begin your cruise along the river Seine, marveling at how different, and even more beautiful, the city appears after sundown.

data.name: Paris Walking Tour: Classic Paris
data.description: Take a walk around Paris with a local guide and see another side of this beautiful city. Walking with a local to guide you and share insights and stories is the best way to tour the classic sights of Paris. The walking tour of Classic Paris offers a complete overview of Paris from the ground up. Virtually every major site in the city center is covered, including the Place de la Concorde, the Louvre Museum, Napoléon's Tomb, the Tuileries Gardens and, of course, the Eiffel Tower.

data.name: Normandy D-Day Tour Guided Small Group From Paris
data.description: On your pilgrimage from Paris to Normandy, leave the details to us. Enjoy an intimate small group tour to discover where Allied forces landed to rescue Europe from Nazi invasion. In one unforgettable day, we’ll take you to experience history where it happened. What better way to honor the sacrifices that changed the course of WW2?You’ll visit legendary Omaha Beach and remnants of the Arromanches artificial harbor left by allied forces. Pause to reflect in the solemn setting of the pristine American Cemetery. Your guide will bring memories to life and help you gain a special understanding of what the Allied soldiers faced and why French locals are still so grateful to the Liberation forces.

data.name: Montmartre, La Boheme! A unique experience in a 2CV and by foot!
data.description:
Explore Montmartre, Paris' its famous heart of art, dance and theater with us in a classic 2CV and by foot! This circuit imagined by real Montmartre residents is an experience including several activities:
- Transportation from your hotel to Montmartre in a vintage car including a photo break at the Eiffel Tower.
- A walking tour of the Montmartre district with a private guide
- A stop for a gourmet break to enjoy delicious plate full of typical French treats and a glass of wine or soft drink
- A portrait by an artist from Montmartre
- Access to the Montmartre Museum

data.name: Tour en 2CV Paris 1h
data.description:
Discover Paris from the inside of our mythic and legendary citroën 2CV. Lean back and enjoy the ride while your private Parisian guide/driver shows you around his city. From the most famous and iconic landmarks to less known but intimate and charming areas of the capital.

French classic music will echo throughout your ears and fill the car creating and incredible ambience which will adapt accordingly to the district and history around you. Furthermore, we want to share our vision and passion for Paris.

Your chauffeur/Guide will pick you up directly from your hotel, apartment or any location inside the walls of Paris for that matter. Just let us know where you are.

At the end of the tour, we can as easily drop you off in one the floral gardens, perhaps a museum or why not indulge the numerous suggestions of your local guide ? The traditional French restaurant or the rooftop with a breathtaking view ? Maybe both !

We adapt Paris to you and together we create memories

data.name: Tour en 2CV Paris 2h
data.description:
Discover Paris from the inside of our mythic and legendary citroën 2CV. Lean back and enjoy the ride while your private Parisian guide/driver shows you around his city. From the most famous and iconic landmarks to less known but intimate and charming areas of the capital.

French classic music will echo throughout your ears and fill the car creating and incredible ambience which will adapt accordingly to the district and history around you. Furthermore, we want to share our vision and passion for Paris.

Your chauffeur/Guide will pick you up directly from your hotel, apartment or any location inside the walls of Paris for that matter. Just let us know where you are.

At the end of the tour, we can as easily drop you off in one the floral gardens, perhaps a museum or why not indulge the numerous suggestions of your local guide ? The traditional French restaurant or the rooftop with a breathtaking view ? Maybe both !

We adapt Paris to you and together we create memories

data.name: Tour à pied avec guide privée quartier latin + patisserie offerte 1h
data.description: L' histoire n’aura plus de secret pour vous après cette visite à pied avec Parisitour. En petit groupe et en compagnie de nos guides conférenciers et véritable experts de la ville de Paris, les conditions sont idéales sont réunies pour apprendre les secrets, anecdotes et surprise de la capitale. Avec une histoire de plus de 2 000 ans, Paris a vécu et survécu le temps. La capitale du pays le plus visité au monde vous attend donc pour une ballade à pied, avec un regard appuyé sur cette ville qui fait tant rêver.

data.name: Paris Undercover
data.description:
Get teleported on a virtual journey through inaccessible places of Paris' monuments in a 360-degree immersion.
Thanks to a combination of virtual and augmented reality technologies, discover fascinating stories and perspectives about these emblematic places of the capital of light.
Discover the machinery of the Eiffel Tower installed in the 19th century in its basements, access the glass roof of the Grand Palais and see for yourself why it is the largest in Europe, climb up to the top of the arrow of the Sainte Chapelle, descend into the hidden corridors of the Pantheon to discover the secrets of the Great Men, sail on the canal that flows under the Bastille square, and finish your journey on the roofs of Montmartre at sunset time...
A fabulous virtual journey between emotions, surprises and wonder!

data.name: Louvre Museum Skip the Line Access Guided Tour
data.description: Paris’s Louvre Museum is no less than the world’s biggest museum, visited by 10.5 million in 2018 alone. Learn the secrets of three of its biggest crowd-pleasers, including the mysterious Mona Lisa, on your two-and-a-half-hour guided tour. You’ll waste no time waiting in line and head straight to the Mona Lisa where your knowledgeable guide will regale you with fascinating tales and tidbits about the lady with the unavoidable gaze and the wry smile, before whisking you off to discover two more unmissable masterpieces. Then you’re free to wander around the museum on your own, coming face to face with works by great masters and discovering new personal favorites by lesser-known artists.

data.name: Private Pastry Tour in Le Marais
data.description:
Welcome to the sweetest area in Paris! During two hours you will try Paris’ most delicious Desserts & Sweet French Specialities in Pastry and Bakery Tour. Chocolates, macarons, sablés, soft caramels. Visit the oldest Food Market of Paris, Marche des Enfants Rouges, vibrant of energy, favorite location of Parisians. Learn all about the word-famous chefs and pastry masters : Poîlane, Jean-Paul Hévin, Jacques Genin, Pierre Hermé…

What's included?
English-speaking licensed guide, dedicated to you and your party only!
2-hour private tour dedicated to the Best Pastry Addresses of Le Marais.
Delicious tastings of 6 different specialties.

data.name: Orsay Museum Private Guided Visit
data.description: See the world’s largest collection of Impressionist art at the Musée d’Orsay in Paris. Enjoy a skip the line, 2-hour private guided tour of the late 19th and early 20th century and see masterpieces by Van Gogh, Renoir, Degas, Cezanne, Manet, and much more.

data.name: Independent Loire Valley Castles From Paris
data.description:
Discover the beautiful Loire Valley region

Visit three majestic French Chateaux : Chambord and Chenonceau and Cheverny

Visit on your own to fully enjoy the setting

Immerse yourself into the royal French History and refined architecture.

Service of a multilingual hostess.

data.name: Paris Sightseeing Night Bike Tour with Seine River Cruise
data.description: Paris Night Bike Tour is perfect for both those new to the city and Parisian veterans. For the beginners, this tour will offer you a fantastic orientation and give you an opportunity to see virtually all of the sites you've read about. For the veterans, you will learn new facts and stories about Paris that you've never heard before. You are sure to agree that riding a bike is the best way to see the "City of Light".

data.name: Paris Walking Tour - The French Revolution
data.description: History comes alive on the Paris Revolution Walking Tour, exploring one of the most important events in modern history. On this fascinating two-hour stroll through Paris' tumultuous history, you'll learn about the troubled times that led up to the storming of the Bastille, the capture of King Louis XVI and Marie Antoinette, the Reign of Terror and the bloody results of the guillotine.

data.name: Paris Highlights Immersive Coach Tour with Histopad
data.description: Discover the Paris of the Parisians and travel through time with the Histopad! Thanks to its interactive functionalities, this new immersive city tour will allow you, in exclusivity, to understand better the history of Paris and its architecture over the centuries. You will visit the most famous neighbourhoods and monuments of the capital, from the Opera Garnier to the Eiffel Tower, through 3D reconstructions, 2D before/after sliders, 360° views of the interiors, enriched with audio commentaries. During your tour, go on a treasure hunt to find mystery objects in well-hidden rooms and don't forget to immortalize your visit with the HistoSelfie! A playful tour designed for the whole family, for young and old!

data.name: Paris Sightseeing City Tour and Seine River Cruise
data.description:
A great combination! Offering an introductory tour of Paris' highlights plus a one hour cruise along the River Seine. After you've meandered around the graceful boulevards and major landmarks of Paris, you can appreciate completely different views as you float along the Seine!

Discover the Paris of the Parisians and travel through time with the Histopad! Thanks to its interactive functionalities, this new immersive city tour will allow you, in exclusivity, to understand better the history of Paris and its architecture over the centuries. You will visit the most famous neighbourhoods and monuments of the capital, from the Opera Garnier to the Eiffel Tower, through 3D reconstructions, 2D before/after sliders, 360° views of the interiors, enriched with audio commentaries. During your tour, go on a treasure hunt to find mystery objects in well-hidden rooms and don't forget to immortalize your visit with the HistoSelfie! A playful tour designed for the whole family, for young and old!

data.name: Skip-the-line & Private Guided Tour: Rodin Museum
data.description: One of the world’s most famous sculptors is on display in the mansion where he worked for years creating and collecting artifacts. On this 2 hour private guided museum tour, you will explore rooms filled with Rodin’s personal collection and artwork. Your expert guide will share the stories and secrets behind the most iconic works, helping you to understand this French artist and the role he played in the 20th century art.

data.name: Beaux-Art Gallery Walk - Private Tour
data.description: The galleries on the left bank have a lot to offer to art lovers and admirers of decorative art. This area is also known for its famous cafés and a numerous bookshops. It is home to the 350 year old school of fine arts – École des Beaux-Arts. Historically the neighbourhood gave refuge to a number of Paris’ cultural past including Eugène Delacroix and Oscar Wilde. In the 1940s it was the centre for the existentialist movement. Today it is blessed with a high end cultural environment and picturesque streets. Take a walk with an art insider and visit the many galleries in this area, while learning about several key historical locations including the school, a key hotel and cafés.

data.name: Visit a market and cook with a foodie
data.description:
Cooking at home with a Parisian !A fun, hands-on, and different food experience, in the home of a food-lover.

 

First, raid the local farmers’ market together with your host, a fanatic French food buff, shopping for seasonal produce. Second, cook – fun and simple recipes to turn produce you like into superb dishes your friends will love you for. Then devours all this food – all of a sudden it’s a party. We celebrate the joy of eating.

data.name: Private day tour to Champagne from Paris
data.description: Discover the pleasures of the Champagne region on this private full-day winery tour from Paris. Everything is included: visit three wineries with tastings at each site, including a world-renowned house such as Moet & Chandon, Mumm or Veuve Clicquot, as well as smaller Champagne estates. You will taste 8 different champagne during the day! Learn about how the popular bubbly drink is made as you stroll through sprawling vineyards and enter cellars. Spend an unforgettable moment during a Masterclass in the heart of the vineyard (depending on weather conditions from April). Enjoy a gourmet lunch at a family-run winery. This tour includes hôtel pick up and drop off by air-conditioned minivan.

data.name: Paris Small-Group Half-Day Bike Tour
data.description: Experience Paris charming back streets, local neighborhoods and amazing monuments as you cruise leisurely through the city of lights. Perfect for all ages and fitness levels, this bike tour is a fantastic orientation to Parisian culture and local secrets. Discover areas like the Marais, Bastille , Seine riversides, the Latin Quarter and secret passageways.

data.name: Skip the Line: Hard Rock Cafe Paris Including Meal
data.description: Skip The Lines and book your dinner at the Paris Hard Rock Cafe ahead of time to take advantage of jumping the queue. Don't waste time waiting in lines on vacation!

data.name: Tootbus Paris Discovery + By Night
data.description:
Explore the major attractions of Paris by day and night!

By day, explore Paris at your own pace across the day route. By night, experience the breath-taking magic of Paris: Opéra, Place Vendôme, Place de la Concorde, Champs Elysées Avenue, Eiffel Tower, Invalides, Louvre Museum…A unique one and a half hour tour to see the City of Light in all its splendour from the top deck of our buses.

data.name: Experience Segways in Paris 90 min
data.description: Enjoy a beautiful hassle free experience around Paris with a local guide on a Segway! Have a private tour in the city with rich history at any time you want with your friends and family! Discover Paris at a faster pace than a walking tour, and save tired legs, by choosing this fun option. Glide down the Champs-Elysées, stop for photo opportunities of the Eiffel Tower, and the Louvre, and enjoy lots of entertaining commentary along the way. Ask our local guide for some tips in Paris after this ride so your adventure would continue!

data.name: Graffiti Workshop
data.description: Discover a new side of Paris with our Graffiti Workshop. Become a real artist for one day and show your creativity on Paris' walls!

data.name: Eiffel Tower 2nd Floor Access & Seine River Lunch Cruise
data.description:
Come to meeting point , meet your guide and you will be get your ticket from our guide. While you are getting your tickets your guide will tell the facts about Eiffel Tower.
And save your time with the skip-the-line Eiffel tower ticket be self-guided and feel free to explore Paris with 2nd floor access.

data.name: Pere Lachaise Cemetery Private Walking Tour
data.description:
This experience of Pere-Lachaise is unique, you will follow your private local expert in the most beautiful and mysterious cemetery of Paris.

Still hesitating? Be curious, you will hear stories about renamed artists and historical figures.
Pay your respects to Jim Morrison, be amazed by the strange grave of Oscar Wilde.
Discover the haunted lovers of Paris : Heloise and Abelard and their gothic tomb surrounded by magic and love.
You can sing La vie en Rose to Edith Piaf, this place is surprisingly very vibrant of life.

In Pere-Lachaise Cemetery you will experience nature, it's the largest park of Paris, with thousands of trees.
In this peaceful atmosphere, away from the busy and touristy areas you will take your time to learn about French history, famous writers, and feel connected to the destiny of many generations.

data.name: Dégustation de vin dans une cave à vin à quelques pas de l’arc de triumph
data.description: Les propriétaires sont argentins donc vous avez la possibilité de déguster un vin argentin ou bien des vins français. Il y a de l’épicerie fine à acheter sur place si vous le souhaitez ainsi que des boissons fraîches. Nous souhaitons que les touristes se sentent al aise pour poser des questions et pas jugés. C’est un endroit cosy et chaleureux.

data.name: Lido de Paris Cabaret "Paris Merveilles" Show with Drinks
data.description: Enjoy an evening of glitzy, glamorous cabaret at the famous Lido de Paris "Paris Merveilles" show which was created by the talented Franco Dragone. The Lido is celebrating its 75th anniversary with a new and festive programme of events full of energy and celebration! Enjoy the new dancing set "Unforgettable", a fabulous journey through the Lido's most beautiful revues. Head to the city’s famous Avenue des Champs-Elysées and discover a world of decadent dancers, sparkling sequins, extraordinary sets, magical lighting and captivating music. With the delectable Bluebell girls on stage and talented chefs producing delicious dishes in the kitchen, take in the sights and sounds of one of Paris’ newest and most impressive cabaret performances. Dreamlike and tantalizing, the show's sets offer a tour de force of imagination and excitement!

data.name: Private Street Art 2-Hour Guided Tour in Paris
data.description: In the Belleville district of Paris, the streets have become an open-air museum that you can explore with insight from a private guide on this 2-hour walking tour. See murals, graffiti, and other street art by a variety of artists as you learn about the evolution of art in Paris from Leonardo to the street.

data.name: Reims Champagne with Minivan
data.description: This is an amazing full day tour combining the art of producing Champagne in the Epernay region and the history heritage of France in Reims.

data.name: Champagne and Epernay Vineyards Tour with Tastings from Paris
data.description:
Uncover the secrets of France’s favourite sparkling wine with a visit to the
Champagne region. Walk the Avenue de Champagne in Epernay, learn about the
production of this celebrated drink in Passy-Griny, visit the grave of founder who
made champagne the way it is today, sample different types of Champagne before
your return to Paris.

• Taste up to 4 different sparkling wines on a tour of the Champagne region
• Enjoy a fully guided visit of the world’s largest Champagne producer
• Hear about the history of Champagne from your professional guide 
• Visit the grave of the “father” of the champagne and see the beautiful vineyards from
his village.
• Visit two different vineries and have tasting in each of them!

data.name: Champagne Area Small Group Day Trip with Cellar Visits & Tastings from Paris
data.description:
Discover the delights of Champagne both the drink and the region itself on this full-day excursion from Paris. You'll visit three different Champagne houses, including Moët & Chandon, to learn about production methods, see the cellars, and hear about the history of this beloved sparkling wine. Enjoy several tastings as well as lunch at local restaurant. Round-trip hotel transportation is provided so you don't have to worry about getting there
yourself.

• Taste 8 different sparkling wines on a tour of the Champagne region from different wineries 
• Visit the cellars of the famous Moët & Chandon or similar Champagne house such
as Veuve Clicqout, G.H. Mumm, Pommery, Mercier (depending on availability)
• Enjoy a 3-course lunch in one of the best restaurants of the champagne region and learn more about the gastronomy of France
• Pick-up and drop-off to your hotel
• Visit three different vineries and have tasting in each of them!
• Tickets and access to all houses

data.name: Versailles Day Bike Tour from Paris
data.description: Take a tour of Versailles with a difference - by bicycle! It's the only way to see Versailles' expansive gardens plus you'll get to see highlights of Versailles that most visitors miss, including Marie Antoinette's country-style Hameau, the Petit Trianon and the Grand Trianon. You'll also enjoy a picnic by the Grand Canal then take a tour of the Palace of Versailles. Versailles is located just 16 kilometers/12 miles from Paris, so we’ll meet near a metro station within Paris before beginning our journey. From there, we’ll take the suburban rail (about 30 minutes) and then pick up our bikes just across from the train station.

data.name: Paris Printemps Haussmann Department Store Backstage Tour
data.description:
The tour of Printemps Haussmann takes you on a journey behind the facade, which is listed as an Historic Monument, and through the history of a building which is one of the most striking examples of the technical and aesthetic changes that have transformed Paris since the Second Empire.

Your guide will open the doors of many areas that are closed to the public, from the terrace on the roof of the store to the labyrinthine galleries that still house all the equipment and infrastructures and that enable the department store to operate today. You will meet the electricians, carpenters and operators who work every day in the basements of Printemps. For the first time, visitors will be able to venture into the "double shell" and discover the inside of the monumental dome that crowns the building.

data.name: Ateliers dégustations cocktails et bières au coeur du Marais
data.description: Les ateliers dégustations se feront le soir dans une cave à vins unique en son genre au Nord du Marais (55 rue de Turbigo, Métro Arts-et-Métiers) qui sera ouverte exclusivement pour l'occasion. La présence d'experts brasseurs et mixologues rendra l'expérience particulièrement passionnante pour les néophytes comme pour les amateurs.

data.name: Wine & Cheese
data.description: Stefan, le plus charmant et le plus humble professionnel du vin de Paris. Toujours avec le sourire, il aime transmettre sa passion du vin, sa connaissance des vignobles et des terroirs. Partager ses nouvelles découvertes et rassembler les gens autour d’une bonne bouteille, telle est sa vocation.

data.name: Luxury Paris Bus Lunch Experience
data.description:
On this unique panoramic bus tour, enjoy a lunch in true Parisian style while admiring top Paris attractions including the Eiffel Tower, the Louvre Museum, Opera, Invalides, Grand et Petit Palais,the Champs-Elysées...
Board a glass-enclosed, double-decker bus, take a seat at your table, and take in beautiful views of Paris from every angle as you munch on fine French cuisine. 
Enjoy your preferred 4-course lunch tour option experience exclusively with Viator!

data.name: Paris Small-Group Food Tour of the Marais
data.description: Wander through the best preserved medieval neighbourhood in Paris. Sample a selection of some of France’s best wines or brandies. Indulge in plates of cheese or charcuterie and taste a creation from Paris's most famed macaron chef. Discover the centre of the city’s Jewish and gay communities. Spot the hidden squares, tucked-away alleyways, and marvellous churches of Marais. This small group tour is limited to maximum 12 guests.

data.name: Paris Eiffel Tower Neighbourhood Tour With A Local
data.description:
Get your camera ready, join a local guide and prepare for some epic views of the Eiffel Tower. But not just any views – these are the views only locals know about. In addition to amazing photo ops you’ll also explore off the beaten path to discover the charming area of Passy, with its pedestrian streets and hidden alleyways. Stop in a local market, enjoy a decadent pastry, and cap off your tour with a glass of wine in an unexpected venue. What could be better?

During the tour you will hear about the water fountains in Paris and how to fill up your bottle instead of buying new ones. You will also learn about the “weird” or “scandalous” social housing policy of this wealthy neighbourhood.

data.name: Family Treasure Hunt at the Louvre Museum
data.description:
Discover the Louvre art collections without boring your children- that's the bet this Family Treasure Hunt at the Louvre Museum makes. You think your children could grow tired of this visit? No way!

A personal activity booklet will keep them hooked throughout this 2-hour museum tour.

Your kids will be encouraged to spot the masterpieces’ hidden details and, in doing so, to solve the "Mystery of the Louvre." They will adore this kid-sized discovery and you will adore hearing them say “can we stay here after the tour??”

IMPORTANT NOTE: this tour doesn't include access to the Leonardo Da Vinci exhibition occurring at the Louvre between October 24th 2019 and February 24th 2020

data.name: Paris Wine and Cheese Private Experience
data.description:
Go shopping for cheese with an award-winning cheesemonger

Sip organic wines and learn how to pair them with your food

Private tasting in an authentic medieval cellar in the trendiest Paris area

data.name: Romantic Cruise "The Old Paris" on the Canal Saint Martin
data.description:
This romantic and out of the ordinary trip of around 2.30 hours offers an opportunity to hear the history of the districts of the "Parisians Paris" as you cruise along the calm waters of this canal, lined with hundred year old trees and spanned by elegant footbridges.

You will slide under the mysterious and spectacular vault of the Bastille, where the light is there magic.

This cruise, which will take you through four double locks with swirling waters and two swing bridges, will allow you to experience the "atmosphere" of the Hotel du Nord created by Marcel Carné, Arletty and Louis Jouvet and share the pleasure of the walkers strolling along the banks lined with pretty boutiques and charming retro style cafés.

Before arriving at the Parc de la Villette (City of Sciences, The Géode, City of Music and themed gardens) you will cross the Bassin de la Villette, formerly a trading port now redeveloped to form the setting for the Rotonde de la Villette.

data.name: Jewish History Private Tour
data.description: On this private walking tour with a guide, discover the layered history of the Jewish community in Paris as you see both historic and contemporary landmarks. You'll also check out sites that are closely linked with Jewish heritage in unexpected ways, such as, for example, Notre-Dame Cathedral.

data.name: Mont Saint Michel Guided Tour with Abbey Visit from Paris
data.description:
A guided tour, specially designed to discover, in one day, the Mont Saint-Michel's marvels. Transportation from Paris by bus or minivan. Entrance and visit of the Abbey included with audioguide.

During this day trip, you will take the most impressive "Marvel of the Western world", the Mont-Saint-Michel which is erected in the heart of a large bay surrounded by the sea and spring tides.

You will discover the medieval city, the Abbey, and all tourist places of the site. You will travel by comfortable bus or minibus with air conditioning with a professional guide who will trace the history of Mont Saint-Michel and guide you through the medieval town and its ramparts.Enjoy a visit of the famous abbey World Heritage of UNESCO, audio guide and ticket included with time to wander at your own pace, around the old city and its streets.

This tour will let you discover Normandy as well, a rich region in history with charming landscapes all along the way

data.name: Eiffel Tower Summit, Immersive Paris Tour & Cruise
data.description:
Paris has so much to offer it’s worth seeing it three ways: In the air, on the road and on water! This four-hour tour is the perfect intro to the city of l’Amour, and will no doubt be the start of your own personal love story with Paris.

Take a spin around the essential sights from the comfort of a coach with our exclusive Histopad : a tablet with interactive functionalities, , through 3D reconstructions, 2D before/after sliders, 360° views of the interiors, enriched with audio commentaries
Then embark on a cruise along the Seine, under its many bridges, before scaling the heights of the Grande Dame (the Eiffel Tower to you and me!) taking in the magnificent views from her second floor.

data.name: Paris Seine River Champagne Evening Cruise
data.description:
1h30 Night Seine Cruise (the most complete circuit in the Seine River)

1 glass of Champagne included (adults only)

Pass in front of the Eiffel Tower during the lights show

Live comments

Bar and snacks on board

A boat with a terrace in a Parisian Bistrot ambiance

Boarding in the center of Paris (Ile de la Cité)

Special Curfew: guaranteed return at 10:00 p.m.

data.name: Paris Private Citroen 2CV Sightseeing Tour
data.description:
Feel like a unique visit, source of good mood, sharing and the unexpected?
Re-discover the charms of Paris through a mind-blowing visit, in one of the most legendary convertible cars! Welcomed by a knowledgeable, kind and elegant chauffeur, dressed in the famous Saint James smock, you’ll enjoy the funny, unprecedented anecdotes, shared with passion. Wonderful avenues, famous monuments…. go with the flow of the must-see sights of the capital, from the soft seats of this iconic French car.

Choose from several departure times in the morning, afternoon or evening and see attention-grabbing attractions like the Eiffel Tower, Notre Dame Cathedral, Opera Garnier and more!

data.name: E Scooter Rental
data.description: Explore the boulevards of Paris with a funny and environment-friendly device. Rent an electric scooter, easy and accessible vehicles and visit Paris !

data.name: Paris Art Nouveau Private Tour
data.description: Learn about the history and symbolism of the Art Nouveau art and architecture movement in Paris on a private 2-hour walking tour. With a private guide, you'll see several testaments to this elegant and innovative style at Metro stations, hotels, a Gothic Revivalist church, and, of course, the Eiffel Tower.

data.name: Versailles Private Half-Day Guided Tour from Paris
data.description: With your Private guide, you will be captured by the opulence of the Palace and Gardens of Versailles tour from Paris. Walk through the glittering Hall of Mirrors and see the Royal Apartments. Admire the enormous gardens and beautiful fountain displays. Weekend visitors from April to October can see the famous fountain shows.You will be having a pick up and return hotel at the end of the tour by private vehicle.

data.name: Loire Castles Small Group Guided Tour from Paris
data.description:
A guided tour from Paris with only 8 participants (max) especially designed to discover the three more prestigious castles of the Loire Valley: Chenonceau, built on the Cher River, Cheverny, private castle and Chambord, jewel of the Renaissance.

Air conditioned and comfortable minivan for a reduced transfer time and therefore a more complete visit, dedicated guide for the small group.

Model of the Renaissance traditions, the Chenonceau Castle is an architectural masterpiece, one of the most romantic castle in the Loire valley.

Considered as the largest and most majestic castle of the Loire valley, Chambord Castle was commissioned as a hunting lodge by François I. The 365 chimneys, 440 rooms, 14 staircases and 800 turrets and capitals give an insight of the magnificent period architecture.

During the visit, you could admire Cheverny Castle which is also remarkable because of the inspiration for Hergé's famous Moulinsart castle in the Tintin comics.

data.name: Paris City Sightseeing Bus Tour
data.description:
Best deal !

Discover Paris during two hours within a double-decker bus totally revisited with translucent roof, retractable windows ... and individual audio guides (9 languages : French, English, Spanish, Italian, Russian, Japanese, Portuguese, German) ... and second floor heating.

Two hours of discover even if it is raining!

You will admire the main 40 tourist sites and monuments in Paris : from the Louvre to the Tour Eiffel going by the Champs-Élysées and Arc de Triomphe, Notre-Dame, Invalides, Pont Alexandre III ... An unbelievable moment just magic !

data.name: Lyon WWII & Resistance Private Tour
data.description:
Delve deep into the history of Lyon and discover the Capital of the Resistance - from the Presqu'île to the Vieux Lyon. Alongside an expert guide, explore the places where the clandestine fight for the Liberation were played out, including the secret passageways known as traboules, used by the Resistance.

During the Second World War, the city of Lyon played a key role in the liberation of France from the Nazis and thereafter became known as the Capital of the Resistance. This tour takes its participants back in time to when Lyon became a hotbed of Resistance against the enemy, almost entirely behind closed doors.

data.name: Paris Big Bus Hop-On Hop-Off Tour
data.description: Discover the sights of Paris on a Big Bus hop-on hop-off tour! Aboard an open-top, double-decker bus, admire panoramic views of top Paris attractions including the Eiffel Tower, Louvre Museum, Notre-Dame Cathedral, Moulin Rouge and more, all while listening to audio commentary. Follow our easy route, and hop on and off at any of the stops around town. To see even more of Paris, you have the option to pair your 1-day or 2-day sightseeing pass with a Seine River cruise. If you have selected the option which allows entrance to the Louvre Museum, hop off on Stop 4 or 5 (see itinerary below) to visit one of the world's largest art museum thanks to your skip-the-line ticket. Enjoy the famous Louvre — home to Leonardo da Vinci's Mona Lisa and many other unmissable artworks.

data.name: Tour en 2CV Paris secret 3h
data.description:
Cette visite en 2CV de 3h est idéale pour découvrir la ville et découvrir les grands monuments parisiens mais aussi les quartiers insoupçonnés les lieux secrets y compris des parisiens eux memes.

Durant la visite, vous profitez des anecdotes de chauffeurs guides qui répondent à toutes vos attentes.

De très belles photos sont prises durant la visite pour immortaliser cet instant.

data.name: Evening Bike Tour & Boat Cruise
data.description:
Join us on an unforgettable evening away from the crowds, exploring the city of lights & it's illuminated monuments as we share with you a unique insight into it's history and contemporary culture. This is no history lecture, instead a fun & informative ride with a licensed local guide, designed to give you the perfect overview of Paris - the city we call home.

We ride the city in the evening as there is less traffic & no crowds and to see the city by day & by night We do not ride on the roads & use plenty of safe bike lanes separate from traffic. We ride on comfortable bikes, in small groups & see far more than you could ever by foot.

data.name: Location scooter PCX Honda 125cc (Permis B/A1) Paris
data.description:
Bikeloc est une agence de location scooter et moto.

data.name: Right Bank of Paris 2-Hour Private Walking Tour
data.description: At the very center of Paris, the area from which the entire city spans out. Enjoy a 2-hour private walking tour of the Right Bank, the projected heart of Paris that is the very center of the French government, thus symbolic of power and authority. On this tour we inspect all the symbols in façades, statues and streets, that carry this message.

data.name: 3 parties de lasergame de 20 minutes
data.description:
Alliant stratégie et activité physique, ce jeu vous permettra de passer un bon moment de convivialité entre amis ou en famille.

Chaque partie dure 20 minutes pendant lesquelles il faut "toucher" le plus grand nombre de personnes et éviter les "tirs-lasers" des adversaires afin de marquer un maximum de points.
Equipés de gilets dernière génération pour une expérience renforcée, vous évoluerez dans deux labyrinthes dessinés spécifiquement pour ce genre d'activité atypique !

Accessible dès 6 ans.
Pour petits et grands, sportifs et non sportifs.

Il faut être un minimum de 6 personnes afin de réserver une partie !

À savoir que les groupes ne sont pas mélangés et que vous serez entre vous, dans un labyrinthe privatisé.

data.name: Eiffel Tower Skip the Line and Small Group Tour with Summit Access by elevator
data.description: Skip the notorious long lines at the Eiffel Tower and discover Paris' most famous landmark with a local and passionate guide during this engaging 90-minute tour. Your ticket includes skip-the-line access to the second level of the Eiffel Tower as well as access to the tower's summit, where you can enjoy a view of Paris' skyline from 1,063 feet above the city.

data.name: Private Guided Tour to Père Lachaise Cemetery in Paris
data.description: Discover the secrets of Père Lachaise cemetery on a walking tour with a private guide, who tells you about the lives and deaths of the famous people buried here.

data.name: Eiffel Tower Guided Tour with Illuminations Cruise & Lido Burlesque Show
data.description: Have fun with 3 icons of Paris. Visit the Eiffel Tower, navigate the Seine and let yourself be surprised by the fabulous Lido show. Nothing is more beautiful with a dazzling show than with bright bubbles. French prestige on stage and on your lips!

data.name: Discover and Enjoy French Wine
data.description: We design this « Tour de France » of wine for those who feel lost reading a French wine list and we help target villages or regions that suit your grape or wine style preferences.

data.name: Private History Walking Tour in Paris for Teens & Family
data.description: For 3 hours, your kids/teens will be engaged with a playful walking tour that includes games and riddles to solve about Paris and its thrilling history. This tour is a family walk that mixes fun facts and stories about Paris. Your private historian expert will provide a live history lesson, minus boredom! You will explore periods of history, from antiquity to the French Revolution, and neighborhoods in Paris while keeping your kids entertained. You will get to observe details that you may have never seen on your own.

data.name: Seine River Guided Cruise Champagne Option by Vedettes de Paris
data.description: At the foot of the Eiffel Tower, embark on the elegant and human sized boats of Vedettes de Paris for a unique 1 hour guided cruise. By day or by night, enjoy the most beautiful way of visiting a city to discover Paris' iconic monuments and bridges while enjoying a glass of Champagne... So French!

data.name: Skateboarding course in Paris, Skatepark Jules Noel
data.shortDescription: No need to take your child any further for them to have fun and to discover a great sporting and entertaining activity! Thanks to this course, your child will discover the basics of skateboarding in a great atmosphere in the very heart of Paris! What else?
data.description:
These courses, which are aimed at beginners and young children from 6 to 9 years old, take place in the Jules Noël skatepark in the 14th arrondissement of Paris. For children aged 10 and over, we offer street skateboarding courses.

Your child will learn to skateboard in a fun way in one of the biggest skatepark of Paris. The teachers are qualified and passionate about their job, and are used to working with children. All the exercises will be approached in the form of games adapted to the level of each child.

The Jules Noël skatepark covers an area of 1300 m² (20 m x 65 m). It is equipped with a funbox comprising two inclined planes, two curves, a handrail and another curve. There is also a 1.80 m quarter, a 1.80 m inclined plane and a corner. All of this is made of wood.

Programme

Meeting either at 12pm at the PSC office (26 Rue au Maire, 75003 Paris), or at 1.30pm, directly at the Jules Noel skatepark.

- Opening of the skatepark. Once all the students are present, you will put on your equipment: protections, helmets, etc...
- You will start the warm-up and listen to the safety instructions
- You will start the course. You will learn the basics, new tricks, the instructor will show you how to position yourself on your skateboard
- This time, the course will be in the form of games, challenges...
- You will discover the skatepark and all its obstacles. You will enjoy a free session with the instructors.
- End of the day at the skatepark

For childrens who wish to take advantage of the accompanying service, the return to the PSC premises is planned for 6pm.

data.name: Longboarding course in Paris, Skatepark Jules Noel
data.shortDescription: Whether you want to start longboard dancing or cruising, learn to master a trick or just have a session, longboarding lessons are for you!
data.description:
Thanks to this longboarding course offered by Paris Longboard, you will learn to skate in the best possible conditions with qualified and passionate instructors!

Whether you want to start longboard dancing or longboard cruising, learn to master a trick or just do a session, the longboarding lessons are for you!

Supervised by passionate and experienced instructors, the courses take place in the 14th arrondissement of Paris, at the Jules Noël skatepark.

The Jules Noël skatepark

This 1300 square meter spot (20 m x 65 m) is equipped with a funbox that includes two inclined planes, two curves, one handrail and another curve. There is also a 1,80m quarter, a 1,80m inclined plane and a corner. Every element is made of wood.

So get into this longboarding lesson adapted to everyone, for a fun session that will make you progress in complete safety!

data.name: Freestyle scooter lesson at Jules Noël, Paris 14th
data.shortDescription: Whether you want to start freestyle scooter, learn to master a trick or just have a session, skateboarding lessons are for you!
data.description:
Thanks to this scooter course offered by Street Trott Klub, you will learn freestyle scooter in the best possible conditions with qualified and passionate instructors!

Whether you want to start freestyling, learn to master a trick or just do a session, STK's scooter lessons are made for you!

Supervised by passionate and experienced state-licensed instructors, the classes take place in the 14th arrondissement of Paris, at the Jules Noël skatepark.

The Jules Noël skatepark

This spot covers an area of 1300 m² (20 m x 65 m). It is equipped with a funbox comprising two inclined planes, two curves, a handrail and another curve. There is also a 1.80 m quarter, a 1.80 m inclined plane and a corner. All made of wood.

So go ahead and take this skateboarding course, which is suitable for everyone, for a fun session that will make you progress in complete safety!

data.name: BMX lesson at Jules Noël, Paris 14th
data.shortDescription: BMX lessons and coaching (skatepark and flatland) in Paris with qualified instructors.
data.description:
The Paris BMX Club is a BMX school based in Paris that offers courses all year round at the Jules Noel skatepark in the 14th arrondissement, all supervised by passionate and qualified instructors.

Your BMX teacher will teach you the basics of this urban sport with a theoretical part and a warm-up beforehand, but above all a technical part to know how to learn and succeed the first figures in the skatepark or on the ground.
Overcome your fears, learn to fall and get up again, know your limits and go beyond them... These exercises will also help you in life because it is on self-confidence that everything is played! Achieving things you thought impossible will help you progress in all areas.

Without forgetting that BMX is above all a fun sport, so the teacher will explain to you that you should not only lose sight of the objective but also have a good time and have fun with your bike.

On the programme:
- Learn the basics of BMX, ride up and down a ramp and work on your balance with flat tricks (on the ground).
- Discover new tricks according to your level: lift the wheels, do a half turn (180), roll on a wheel (manual), take your hands off, turn the handlebars (barspin), drop a ramp...
- Some DIY skills to learn how to repair a bike.

The Jules Noël skatepark covers an area of 1300 m² (20 m x 65 m). It is equipped with a funbox comprising two inclined planes, two curves, a handrail and another curve. There is also a 1.80 m quarter, a 1.80 m inclined plane and a corner. All of this is made of wood.
